moni.chapter.058B7FE882875343.title: Some Assembly Required
moni.chapter.0654B76C306712BE.title: Genesis
moni.chapter.0E9D23BEF4A86E57.title: Groundwork
moni.chapter.118959024F296F70.title: Matter-Energy
moni.chapter.15E8BBD0CD310663.title: Feeding the Machine
moni.chapter.1956832191841F25.title: dependencies
moni.chapter.25FEB9E61EEC1A96.title: The Elements
moni.chapter.2763DAD954E0EED8.title: The Factory
moni.chapter.395B849AC6294153.title: Progression
moni.chapter.457D17593A814D73.title: Home Stretch
moni.chapter.68F29871402A6B1B.title: Into the Microverse
moni.chapter.6D8C988EFB3F7437.title: Simulating Resources
moni.chapter.7489B5042AFE2290.title: Scaling Up
moni.quest.00011E5DD7EEE8DB.title: UV Assembler
moni.quest.00011E5DD7EEE8DB.description1: With the &3Ultimate Assembler&r, you can assemble &6Tritanium Coils&r.
moni.quest.0002BA59214CE34A.description1: &6Silicon&r in its solid form is required to produce &6Transistors&r, which are required for &6HV Circuits&r. Notice that the recipe for a &6Silicon Ingot&r calls for &d2,273 K&r. This is why we built &6Kanthal Coils&r earlier - &6Cupronickel Coils&r can't reach that temperature.
moni.quest.0002BA59214CE34A.description2: Directly heating &6Silicon Dust&r you get from Electrolyzing various materials is an option, but a slow and energy-hungry one. An alterative method is to obtain &6Silicon Dioxide Dust&r by repurposing &6Glass&r you're producing, and heating it with &6Carbon Dust&r. This produces &6Silicon Ingots &dover 5x&r faster, with a side of &eCarbon Monoxide&r for use in various chemical processes.
moni.quest.0006FEA1843FEA0A.description1: Simulating mob kills will occasionally result in &6Predictions&r of that mob's type.
moni.quest.0006FEA1843FEA0A.description2: Putting &6Mob Predictions&r into a &3Loot Fabricator&r will allow you to obtain one of various items related to that mob.
moni.quest.0006FEA1843FEA0A.description3: Like &3Simulation Chambers&r, Loot Fabricators are &anot sided&r, accepting input and allowing extraction from &aall sides&r.
moni.quest.00203B07F8A930DA.description1: Yeah, you get to craft &6Nether Stars&r. Cool, huh?
moni.quest.00203B07F8A930DA.description2: Over the course of the pack, Nether Stars are going to be needed in quantities that far exceed a reasonable player's ability to farm Withers. &eCraft them, don't bother trying to farm them.
moni.quest.00203B07F8A930DA.subtitle: ASSEMBLE… TOO!
moni.quest.00203B07F8A930DA.title: Craftable Nether Stars
moni.quest.004344AC70AE88F1.description1: &6Luminessence&r is used in a number of things, but right now, it will be a component in your &aExtended Crafting Tables&r.
moni.quest.007B1B457AA3F497.title: Element 110: Darmstadtium
moni.quest.0143E903317263D4.description1: &2Polytetrafluoroethylene (PTFE, or Teflon) is a polymer made from Carbon and Fluorine.
moni.quest.0143E903317263D4.description2: &2This polymer is most importantly used to make Large Chemical Reactors. It's also required for IV and LuV Machine Hulls, and can be substituted in some cases for higher yields.
moni.quest.0143E903317263D4.title: &2Polytetrafluoroethylene
moni.quest.014D28F123261D8D.description1: First, you need to find some &6Budding Amethyst&r, which will be located in &eGeodes&r. Mining this block will damage it, so you should set up automation on-site or transport it with a &3Cut Paste Gadget&r or &3Spatial Storage&r.
moni.quest.016054D07025C8B1.title: Element 073: Tantalum
moni.quest.01CC71429CFCAE0B.description1: Circuits along this line are HV, and can all be substituted in recipes.
moni.quest.01CC71429CFCAE0B.description2: The pattern stays the same: the rightmost circuit comes in larger quantities and is overall easier to produce.
moni.quest.01CC71429CFCAE0B.title: HV Circuits
moni.quest.01E542E1C9DAF5B4.description1: To research this recipe you will need muiltiple &3HPCA&rs linked together with a &3Network Switch&r.
moni.quest.01E542E1C9DAF5B4.title: The First Tier Nine Circuit
moni.quest.01F946C4A4BF4FFE.description2: Don't worry if you can't make these for a while. You'll probably get to them around IV power.
moni.quest.023197AB7CDBDD6E.description1: The first source of &6Naquadah &r(&6Snowchestite&r on HM+) and &2Kaemanite Ore&r (for &6Trinium&r), via a mission with &6Stabilized Plutonium&r. Later on you can mine these ores from &6Glacio&r.
moni.quest.023197AB7CDBDD6E.title: &2Tier Five Microminer
moni.quest.025543EDB0A4AC22.description1: A refined type of steel, made from &6Silicon Dust&r and &6Steel&r.
moni.quest.025543EDB0A4AC22.description2: This material is frequently used in electronics and digital equipment.
moni.quest.02782201B4D4DB5C.title: Element 009: Fluorine
moni.quest.02EFF3E87346EDF4.title: Element 051: Antimony
moni.quest.031A5A2B3AA99782.description1:
Blast your &6Wrought Iron&r into &6Steel&r. This process yields &6Ashes&r as a byproduct, which can be centrifuged for more byproducts or simply voided.

How convenient that you can make &6Steel&r just from &6Amethyst&r!
moni.quest.03819818FD208DEE.title: Element 007: Nitrogen
moni.quest.0381DCD3FD3C9ED2.description1: A &6Programmed Circuit&r is an item used to configure machines. In essence, they tell a machine what to make if there's multiple things it could make from a certain input.
moni.quest.0381DCD3FD3C9ED2.description2: For example, the &3Wiremill&r produces different thicknesses of &6wires&r depending on the config - &ecircuit 1&r produces &61x wires&r, &ecircuit 4&r produces &64x wires&r, etc. The &eEMI&r recipe will tell you which circuit configuration is required.
moni.quest.0381DCD3FD3C9ED2.description3: Each machine and item input bus comes with a &2free "ghost circuit"&r. Click the circuit slot on the &9bottom right&r of the GUI to access this ghost circuit. Left- and right-click or scroll to adjust the configuration.
moni.quest.0381DCD3FD3C9ED2.description4: That said, the Programmed Circuit item (crafted from a single &6LV Circuit&r) still has its uses:
moni.quest.0381DCD3FD3C9ED2.description5: - Whilst holding a programmed circuit, shift-right click the machine to set a &bGhost Circuit&r of the same configuration in the machine's circuit slot.
moni.quest.0381DCD3FD3C9ED2.description6: - When you're sure that the items you put into a machine won't have any conflicts, you can put &emultiple circuit configs&r into a machine, and it will be able to handle recipes which call for any of those configs. This is useful for machines such as the &3Alloy Blast Smelter&r, but you won't encounter that for a while.
moni.quest.0381DCD3FD3C9ED2.title: &9Programmed Circuits
moni.quest.038D06BCA022C1BF.description1: &3Extractors&r are useful for melting things into liquids. For example, you can melt down ingots into molten metals, or &6Rubber Sheets&r into liquid &9Rubber&r.
moni.quest.038D06BCA022C1BF.description2: You can make molds from &6Steel&r and use &3Fluid Solidifiers&r to form various components more efficiently from fluids, like &6Gears&r.
moni.quest.038D06BCA022C1BF.subtitle: &2Your machine of choice for liquefying metals!
moni.quest.038D06BCA022C1BF.title: &2Extractor
moni.quest.039F70814051413E.description2: The next circuit theme, Wetware, will require a lot of them.
moni.quest.039F70814051413E.description3: Tier Six Microminers are the first option to get some eggs (enough for this quest, as it happens). Later on, you'll also get a much better mission for them using a &6Tier Eight Microminer&r.
moni.quest.039F70814051413E.title: Breaking Some Eggs
moni.quest.040B3FCD82533BD9.description1: Bending the laws of physics is no small feat. Thankfully, you've come up with a solution that is compact enough to fit on a Microminer.
moni.quest.040B3FCD82533BD9.description2: As you can probably guess, these are expensive.
moni.quest.040B3FCD82533BD9.subtitle: Handle with care: could destroy the universe.
moni.quest.040B3FCD82533BD9.title: &9Field Stabilized Prismatic Pulsar Compound
moni.quest.044553423097C3C7.description1: Often called the Platline, refining &6Platinum Group Sludge&r (PGS) into the platinum group metals requires quite a long processing line. Right now, you only have access to the first part of the line: the extraction of &6Ruthenium&r and &6Rhodium&r.
moni.quest.044553423097C3C7.description2: Treating certain ores with &6Nitric Acid&r yields &6PGS&r - &6Sheldonite&r has the highest yields, but others might be easier to gather. Then, using an &6HV&r+ &3Centrifuge&r and &6Aqua Regia&r, break that down into the PGS salts, and reduce those salts to the metals.
moni.quest.044553423097C3C7.description3: You will need Ruthenium and Rhodium in &6RTM Coils&r, the &3Alloy Blast Smelter&r, and various &9IV&r components.
moni.quest.044553423097C3C7.subtitle: Is this that "Gregtech PGS" people refer to?
moni.quest.044553423097C3C7.title: &2Platinum Group Processing
moni.quest.04475771966A92C3.description1: An advanced ingredient used for the &aUltimate Extended Crafting Table&r and the &aEpic Extended Crafting Table&r.
moni.quest.0472A05CFBF4A2F0.description1: Circuits along this line are ZPM, and can all be substituted in recipes.
moni.quest.0472A05CFBF4A2F0.title: ZPM Circuits
moni.quest.04A0863937695AC4.description1: The &aCrescent Hammer&r is for use on machines from &bThermal Expansion&f, but can be used for basic wrench interactions with blocks from almost every mod. &9It can also now adjust Gregtech pipes.
The &aCrescent Hammer&r is for use on machines from &bThermal Expansion&f, but can be used for basic wrench interactions with blocks from almost every mod. &9It can also now adjust Gregtech pipes,
The &aCrescent Hammer&r is for use on machines from &bThermal Expansion&f, but can be used for basic wrench interactions with blocks from almost every mod. &9It can also now adjust Gregtech pipes,
moni.quest.04A0863937695AC4.description2: The &aYeta Wrench&r is used with machines from &bEnder IO&f, and has several special display modes (&6sneak-mouse wheel&f to switch between them).
The &aYeta Wrench&r is used with machines from &bEnderIO&f, and has several special display modes (&6sneak-mouse wheel&f to switch between them).
The &aYeta Wrench&r is used with machines from &bEnderIO&f, and has several special display modes (&6sneak-mouse wheel&f to switch between them).
moni.quest.04A0863937695AC4.description3: The &aGregTech Wrench&r is used to rotate GregTech machines and redefine their output sides. &2It also has some of the capabilities of the other Wrenches.&r
moni.quest.04A0863937695AC4.description4: You can see which mod a machine is from with the &9blue text&f at the bottom of its tooltip.
moni.quest.04A0863937695AC4.subtitle: Confused about all the Wrenches yet?
moni.quest.04A0863937695AC4.title: &9Wrenches Galore
moni.quest.04BDE09518C184E4.description1: &9Naphtha&r is best utilized for Steam-Cracking and distilling for its constituents, or for the production of &6Gasoline&r.
moni.quest.04BDE09518C184E4.description2: Notably, it contains &9Light Fuel&r and &9Heavy Fuel&r for making more &9Diesel&r, as well as many other useful chemicals for a variety of purposes.
moni.quest.04BDE09518C184E4.title: Naphtha
moni.quest.04EABD3D2C72D2C5.description1: Organic processes require a different kind of sterilization.
moni.quest.04EABD3D2C72D2C5.description2: Like with the Cleanroom you'll need to make some filter casings, but this time you're keeping out microbes instead of particles. You'll need &3Fusion MK II&r to get the &6Tritanium&r for them.
moni.quest.04EABD3D2C72D2C5.description3: Unfortunately, these filters can't be used on a Cleanroom you can enter - you would contaminate it immediately. They're used in the Sculk Vat instead.
moni.quest.04EABD3D2C72D2C5.description4: To run Sterile Cleanroom recipes inside regular multiblocks, you'll need a &6Sterile Cleaning Maintenance Hatch&r.
moni.quest.04EABD3D2C72D2C5.description5: &cNote: Sterile Cleaning Hatches do not allow for regular Cleanroom recipes, and putting a multiblock machine with one in a regular Cleanroom will not change that.&r
moni.quest.04EABD3D2C72D2C5.title: &2A Different Type of Clean
moni.quest.0508D3CCB6C876A3.description1: There are 3 materials you will need from processing &6Naquadah&r: &6Enriched Naquadah&r (Nq+), &6Naquadria&r (Nq*), and &6Trinium&r (Ke).
moni.quest.0508D3CCB6C876A3.description2: There are 2 different ways to process Naquadah, each resulting in different materials.&r
moni.quest.0508D3CCB6C876A3.description3: The first option is to process ores from the &6Tier Five Microminer&r. &6Naquadah Ore&r yields Nq+ (through the &3Magnetic Separator&r) and &6Kaemanite Ore&r yields Ke.
moni.quest.0508D3CCB6C876A3.description4: The second option is to do the full processing of &6Naquadah Dust&r with &6Fluoroantimonic Acid&r. This is a decently involved process, but not only does it yield both other Nq materials, it also grants byproducts of &6Titanium, Sulfur, Indium, Phosphorus, Barium, and Gallium&r.
moni.quest.0508D3CCB6C876A3.title: Naquadah Processing
moni.quest.0523F4AB9A794390.description1: &2Certain multiblocks in GTm will require a Maintenance Hatch and/or Muffler Hatch. &cThese cannot be shared between multiblocks. &2If you knew Maintenance in GT5u, fret not - Maintenance mechanics are far less punishing in GTm.
moni.quest.0523F4AB9A794390.description2: &r- &aMuffler&r: This hatch must be &cunobstructed&r so it can output its beautiful smoke particles. When a recipe is performed, there is a small chance for the &3Muffler Hatch&r to give bonus items, typically tiny Dusts of Ash. It voids excess when full, so do not worry about it stopping machines from running.
moni.quest.0523F4AB9A794390.description3: - &aMaintenance&r: You will need to do Maintenance for the Multiblock to begin operating. This is done by having a &9Wrench&r, a &9Screwdriver&r, a &9Soft Mallet&r, a &9Hammer&r, a &9Wire Cutter&r, and a &9Crowbar&r in your inventory, opening the Maintenance Hatch and &eclicking the center spot once&r. &cNo need to move tools individually&r. Alternatively, you can fix problems by placing &9Tape&r in the Maintenance Hatch.
moni.quest.0523F4AB9A794390.description4: Maintenance problems may occur after &948 real hours of activity&r. Needless to say, they are very rare. Each problem increases recipe durations by 10%%. Fixing the problems is done the same way as above.
moni.quest.0523F4AB9A794390.description5: Later, you will unlock other Maintenance Hatches that do not enforce fixing the problems manually. Both start with &6no Maintenance required&r:
moni.quest.0523F4AB9A794390.description6: - &3Configurable Maintenance Hatch&r (&6HV&r): You can configure it to cut off &a10%% duration&r on recipes, at the cost of making Maintenance issues happen three times as fast. That is &916 real hours&r of activity. &9Tape&r can fix problems in this Hatch as well.
moni.quest.0523F4AB9A794390.description7: - &3Automatic Maintenance Hatch&r (&6HV&r): Eliminates the need for Maintenance, &6forever&r.
moni.quest.0523F4AB9A794390.description8: - &3Cleaning Maintenance Hatch&r (&9IV&r): Functions as an &3Automatic Maintenance Hatch&r, and allows the multiblock to perform recipes that would otherwise need be performed in a &2Cleanroom&r.
moni.quest.0523F4AB9A794390.description9: - &3Sterile Cleaning Maintenance Hatch&r (&cZPM&r): Functions as an &3Automatic Maintenance Hatch&r, and allows the multiblock to perform recipes that require &aSterilization&r.
moni.quest.0523F4AB9A794390.title: &2Maintenance and Muffler Mechanics
moni.quest.053DDDCD2505E20B.description1: &9JEAN Gasoline is the most powerful combustion fuel, using some anomalous ingredients to generate a staggering 20,480 EU per mB of fuel. The trade-off is the extremely complex processing lines you must set up for it.
moni.quest.053DDDCD2505E20B.description2: To refine High-Octane Gasoline to JEAN Gasoline, you will need:
moni.quest.053DDDCD2505E20B.description8: To get the most out of this, run it in an Extreme Combustion Engine with Liquid Oxygen.
moni.quest.053DDDCD2505E20B.title: &9JEAN Gasoline
moni.quest.055193574D203872.description1: &6Robot Arms&r are components of several powerful machines, and are also useful as a machine cover for precise item movement.
moni.quest.055193574D203872.description2: It's one of the more expensive components, as it requires motors, a piston, and a circuit.
moni.quest.055193574D203872.title: LV Robot Arm
moni.quest.0562D9F4C441EAF9.description1: &6Cryococcus&r is a powerful material used for crafting high-grade components, items, and machines from &9Sculk&r. It is also able to conduct quite a few amps of &4UHV&r power.
moni.quest.0562D9F4C441EAF9.description2: Five &6Cryolobus Blocks&r can be processed in the Discharger to create an equal output of five &6Cryococcus Blocks&r.
moni.quest.0562D9F4C441EAF9.title: &9Cryococcus
moni.quest.057D8689F19564AA.description1: &3Extended Inscribers&r are able to perform up to 4 inscribing jobs at the same time, allowing easier automation.
moni.quest.057D8689F19564AA.subtitle: Not advanced, but extended
moni.quest.057D8689F19564AA.title: &9Extended Inscribing
moni.quest.0591171F13A45283.description1: &3Copper Furnaces&f are another step up in speed, taking &a100 ticks&f to smelt an item.
moni.quest.0591171F13A45283.title: Furnace v3.0
moni.quest.059A9B12C8478025.description1: While not required for progression, the space station serves as a cool place to build a base! The resources shown above are what are required to create a space station, &9which can be done from the planet section menu&r.
moni.quest.059A9B12C8478025.rich_descrip: for a refresher on various things that would be helpful in any space base.
moni.quest.059A9B12C8478025.title: &9Space Stationing
moni.quest.05C97DC2035CE7CB.title: Element 062: Samarium
moni.quest.0607A59215F0F8B3.description1: A pair of &6Double-Layer RF Capacitors&r combined with some &6Vibrant Alloy&r and &6Glowstone&r creates an &6Octadic RF Capacitor&r, which is a tier three &bEnder IO&r capacitor.
moni.quest.0608EE0A3BDE58D5.description1: &9The upgraded form of the Soul Binder.&r
moni.quest.0608EE0A3BDE58D5.description2: Accepts any &6Parallel Control Hatch&r, parallelizing up to &e4096x&r with the best hatch!
moni.quest.0608EE0A3BDE58D5.title: &9Quintessence Infuser
moni.quest.060A5766B021FC77.description1: Combine &6Infinity&r and &6Null&r under altered laws of physics to create &6Monium&r, the strongest possible material.
moni.quest.060A5766B021FC77.subtitle: The be-all end-all
moni.quest.060A5766B021FC77.title: &9Monium
moni.quest.60A7102F5BA0DE19.description1: When sourcing &9Ethanol&r from &9Biomass&r, you should use a &3Distillery&r instead of a &3Distillation Tower&r - the extra &9Water&r byproduct is not worth the increased energy cost.
moni.quest.062B4DDD703338D1.title: Corrupted Microverses
moni.quest.062B4DDD703338D1.description1: When a &3Shattered Microverse&r runs out of integrity, it becomes a &3Corrupted Microverse&r.
moni.quest.062B4DDD703338D1.description2: Corrupted Microverses decay passively, even when a recipe is running.
moni.quest.062B4DDD703338D1.description3: Corrupted microverses can be repaired with &6Quantum Flux&r, however be careful to not overfeed it. Flux can now be consumed even when less than 1%% of Integrity is missing, and when it does so the recipe progress regresses.
moni.quest.061904A6FEED5B66.description1: &6Chromium&r is used in the production of many alloys. &6Stainless Steel&r, &6Vanadium Steel&r, and &6Kanthal&r are the ones you will encounter soon.
moni.quest.061904A6FEED5B66.description2: It is primarily obtained by electrolyzing &6Ruby Dust&r. Alternatively you can process &6Ruby Ore&r for a small chance to get chromium. You can also mine &6Chromite&r in The End. You will need a lot of this soon, so be sure to accumulate a lot of it.
moni.quest.061904A6FEED5B66.title: Chromium
moni.quest.06794F93613F1496.description1: &6Oversize Interfaces&r have the same number of slots as &6Extended Interfaces&r, but each slot can hold up to 1024 items or 64 buckets of fluids.
moni.quest.06794F93613F1496.title: Oversize Interface
moni.quest.069773756716E192.description2: …or building a new one, which is probably better.
moni.quest.069773756716E192.description3: Yet again this quest asks for the minimal number of casings. Make an extra &229&r if you don't want more than &a2 Fluid Inputs&r&r and &a1 Fluid Output&r. Don't forget the extra &e31 Fusion Glass&r or &6Fusion Machine Casings&r!
moni.quest.069773756716E192.description4: &bYes, the Fusion Glass is the same tier as last time, but the Fusion Machine Casings are more expensive.&r
moni.quest.069773756716E192.description5: Make sure you're using &6ZPM Energy Hatches&r!
moni.quest.069773756716E192.description6: If you insist on upgrading instead of making a new one, don't dismantle the current one before you're sure you've got everything you need to upgrade it, or you might end up having to rebuild the &3MK I Fusion Reactor&r again.
moni.quest.069773756716E192.description7: The &3MK II Fusion Reactor&r has an energy buffer of &e320M EU&r.
moni.quest.069773756716E192.title: &2Fusion Reactor MK II
moni.quest.069D243B809E0D5D.description1: The &3Wireless Active Transformer&r, or WAT for short, is a wireless version of the &6Active Transformer&r. It uses Einstein-Rosen Bridges to transfer power across vast distances or even &9across dimensions&r.
moni.quest.069D243B809E0D5D.description2: Each WAT can be set to a specific numbered frequency. Once attuned, all WATs operating on the &9same frequency&r act like a single active transformer, allowing for &9perfectly efficient&r power transfer.
moni.quest.069D243B809E0D5D.description3: Each WAT consumes &6Quantum Coolant&r each second to function. This coolant has a &2base drainage rate&r, which scales with the maximum amount of power the WAT can transfer.
moni.quest.069D243B809E0D5D.description4: &cHM+: Without Quantum Coolant, the WAT will explode&r.
moni.quest.069D243B809E0D5D.subtitle: Spooky power from a distance.
moni.quest.069D243B809E0D5D.title: &2Wireless Active Transformer
moni.quest.06E9B9DDDB245F38.description1: The &9Tinker's Workstation&r is able to charge items at a modest rate, but can only charge items that use &aRF&r. &9This is also used for upgrading &bThermal&9 items&r.
moni.quest.06E9B9DDDB245F38.description2: The Turbo Charger is a little more expensive, but is able to charge items at a &omuch&r faster rate and is able to charge items that use &aRF&r and &aEU&r.
moni.quest.06E9B9DDDB245F38.title: &9Charging Items
moni.quest.07057CDE4E021BA7.description1: Your first &aUEV&r circuit. With this circuit tier, you have unlocked the door to technological marvels that bend the laws of reality.
moni.quest.07057CDE4E021BA7.title: &9The First Tier Ten Circuit
moni.quest.073533F489D121FF.description1: This is a rudimentary digital item storage device. By placing a &6Storage Cell&r inside it, you can access the contents as though you were looking through a chest. You can carry the disk to another location and place it down in a different ME Chest if you want, and the items will come with it.
moni.quest.073533F489D121FF.description2: &cDon't put Storage Cells inside other portable mod inventories like a Satchel, (or vice-versa) as you risk corrupting the contents of the Satchel and the Storage Cell.&r There's technical reasons why this happens (NBT overflow), and it's not unique to these items, but that's not really worth going into.
moni.quest.073533F489D121FF.subtitle: The &aME Chest&r is somewhat impractical to use on its own, but it's a necessary ingredient for the much more useful &6ME Drive&r.
moni.quest.07508736CEE01C7F.description1: You can copy and paste settings from different &eFurnaces&r using a &6Furnace Setting Linker&r.
You can copy and paste settings from different &eFurnaces&r using a &6Furnaces Setting Linker&r
You can copy and paste settings from different &eFurnaces&r using a &6Furnaces Setting Linker&r
moni.quest.07508736CEE01C7F.subtitle: Copying your furnace's settings
moni.quest.07508736CEE01C7F.title: Ctrl + C, Ctrl + V
moni.quest.07706AB24D866D7F.title: Element 071: Lutetium
moni.quest.077AA27F26B7831F.description2: Although there are several types of rechargeable batteries you can make, &2Lithium Batteries&r are the best ones, and the only ones you should really consider making.
moni.quest.077AA27F26B7831F.description3: &6Lithium&r is possible to find inside of &6Tungsten&r veins, however, they are only found in the End dimension. Consider "buying" some Lithium with &9Monicoins&r — you'll also want to buy Stibnite for the Antimony needed in &6Battery Alloy&r.
&6Lithium&r is possible to find inside of &6Tungsten&r veins, however, they are only found in the End dimension.
&6Lithium&r is possible to find inside of &6Tungsten&r veins, however, they are only found in the End dimension.
moni.quest.077AA27F26B7831F.title: LV Power Storage
moni.quest.07D45A3F8A74A61C.description1: &aMining Hammers&r offer a relatively cheap way to mine out areas much faster. They clear a 3x3 area of blocks (unless you're crouching) and mine quickly.
moni.quest.07D45A3F8A74A61C.description2: &2Gregtech has Mining Hammers natively! You can craft them with any GT tool material. &r
moni.quest.07D45A3F8A74A61C.description3: Your free 4 Diamond Mining Hammers should last you a while, and you can always fix them using an anvil and some diamonds.
moni.quest.07D45A3F8A74A61C.subtitle: Diggy Diggy Hole
moni.quest.07D45A3F8A74A61C.title: Mining Hammers
moni.quest.07DC7FC23332B847.description1:
Can be used to autobuild multiblocks.

Note that if you don't have hatches/buses in your inventory, the Terminal will leave enough air blocks for the minimum required hatches.

Can be used to autobuild multiblocks.

Note that if you don't have hatches/buses in your inventory, the Terminal will leave enough air blocks for the minimum required hatches.
Of course this is Expert Mode, so you won't get one for free.
moni.quest.07DC7FC23332B847.subtitle: Faster Multiblock Building
moni.quest.07DC7FC23332B847.title: &9Terminal
moni.quest.07E757AAA1C7435D.description1: &6Actinium&r is a radioactive material, and can be obtained by bombarding &6Uranic Solution&r or &6Radon Salt&r with neutrons from a &6Neutron Emitter&r, having a chance of creating Actinium.
moni.quest.07E757AAA1C7435D.description2: Keep in mind, though, that over time, the emitter will &edegrade&r, so keeping spares is important.
moni.quest.07E757AAA1C7435D.description3: Actinium is the base material for the &4UHV&r components, so prepare to make a lot of it.
moni.quest.07E757AAA1C7435D.subtitle: Radioactive!
moni.quest.07E757AAA1C7435D.title: &9Actinium
moni.quest.081101DEE6227D87.description1: &6Sulfur Ore&r is the only source of &6Sulfur Dust&r that's currently available to you.
moni.quest.081101DEE6227D87.description2: You may want to spend a few &9Monicoins&r on the ore to jumpstart your power storage.
moni.quest.081101DEE6227D87.description3: Otherwise the ore is only available in &athe Nether&r, and the only way to get there is with a &6Nether Cake&r. Oh no!
moni.quest.081101DEE6227D87.title: Sulfur Ore
moni.quest.0874A0191325CFDB.description1: A perfect material for making chopsticks.
moni.quest.0874A0191325CFDB.description2: Also the tier material for Extreme Voltage (EV).
moni.quest.0874A0191325CFDB.title: Titanium
moni.quest.0889C9E0DD0FDF06.description1: The &6Naquadah-doped Boule&r produces even more wafers per boule. It also is relatively cheap, due to the abundance of Naquadah that is gained from the &eTier 5 Microminer Mission&r.
moni.quest.0889C9E0DD0FDF06.description2: This boule also allows the production of &6Advanced System-on-Chip&r wafers.
moni.quest.0889C9E0DD0FDF06.title: Naquadah Boules
moni.quest.08948A23B3A17923.description1: &9LaserIO&r's energy cards can be upgraded with &6Energy Overclockers&r to allow them to transport energy. &eNote that only the extracting card requires an overclocker!&r
moni.quest.08948A23B3A17923.description2: Alongside the nodes themselves being wireless, upgrading the throughput of a given node is &eas simple as swapping the card out!&r
moni.quest.08948A23B3A17923.description3: These can be used to transport energy from your &3Steam Dynamos&r to various destinations.
moni.quest.08948A23B3A17923.subtitle: The most basic tier of &aRF&r energy card from &bLaserIO&r.
moni.quest.08948A23B3A17923.subtitle.har: The most basic tier of &aRF&r Card from &bLaserIO&r.
moni.quest.08948A23B3A17923.title: &9Laser Nodes and Energy Cards
moni.quest.08B36E2C37C417E5.description1: &9Rubber&r has been sufficient for making cables so far, but you will soon discover that this basic type of rubber won't withstand more than &2Extreme Voltage&r. Higher quality rubber is necessary to properly insulate your wires.
moni.quest.08B36E2C37C417E5.description2: There are two better types of rubber, and you will eventually need to make both of them. &eThese can also be used for insulating lower voltage wires more efficiently, requiring less fluid&r!
moni.quest.08B36E2C37C417E5.description3: &9&2Both Styrene-Butadiene Rubber (SBR) and Silicone Rubber (SiR) can wrap any Cable tier.&r However, SBR requires petrochemistry infrastructure you may not have yet, and is not mandatory until you are making late-game components. On the other hand, SiR can conveniently be made from chemicals you are already familiar with. By setting this up now, you won't have to change your wire coating material later!
moni.quest.08B36E2C37C417E5.description4: To make Silicone Rubber, you will need to create &6Polydimethylsiloxane Dust&r in one of several ways, then mix it with &6Sulfur&r in a &3Chemical Reactor&r. You can then coat wires with it in an &3Assembling Machine&r.
moni.quest.08B36E2C37C417E5.title: &2New Cable Coverings
moni.quest.08D087B38EE0602B.description1: Crush your &6Netherrack&r into &6Netherrack Dust&r. Used for &6Nether Cakes&r, but can also be centrifuged for &6Redstone&r, &6Gold&r, &6Sulfur&r, and &6Coal&r.
moni.quest.0933FF764C1D2399.description1: Combine your &6Dust&r and some &6Water&r to make &6Clay&r.&r Turns into many useful resources.
moni.quest.093883A81E6926E2.description1:
Harvest the growing &6Amethyst Clusters&6 with an &bApplied Energistics&r &3Annihilation Plane&r enchanted with &bSilk Touch&r on a network that only has storage for &6Amethyst Clusters&r, then turn those into shards with your method of choice.

You can grow the Amethyst faster with &bApplied Energistics&r &3Growth Accelerators&r, just like Budding Certus Quartz.
moni.quest.098CF1FD284B09E7.description1: Better fuel means you need to use less of it.
moni.quest.098CF1FD284B09E7.title: &9More Efficient
moni.quest.09C0CDC1DFA7842D.description1: &2Pumps are now available in GT. Useful for gathering Oil or perhaps Lava from the Nether.
moni.quest.09C0CDC1DFA7842D.title: &2Pumps
moni.quest.09EED0C4106265BC.description1: &6Redstone Flux Cells&r can store large amounts of power. They can be upgraded with the &6Holding&r enchantment, &6Integral Components&r, and &6RF Coil augments&r to boost their capacity.
moni.quest.09EED0C4106265BC.title: RF Storage
moni.quest.09F8678BBA41D15E.description1: &6Hellish Matter&r and &6Ender Pearls&r can be crafted into Extraterrestrial Matter.
moni.quest.09F8678BBA41D15E.title: &5End&r Matter
moni.quest.0A34290F579BB4E2.description2:
This age will have you interact with &9new Microverse types&r, introduce &9crafting with Color&r and offers the key to &2Unlimited Knowledge&r.
Craft &6Optical Circuits&r and &6Infinity Ingots&r, and obtain &6Necrosiderite&r from &3Shattered Microverses&r to enter UEV.
moni.quest.0A34290F579BB4E2.description3: &2You should consider spending some time to go back and remodel your base for higher throughput. From here on out, material demands will skyrocket and it's not fun to wait hours for autocrafts to finish!&r
moni.quest.0A34290F579BB4E2.subtitle: The Game has Changed
moni.quest.0A34290F579BB4E2.title: &4UHV&r Age
moni.quest.0A6D3E69FEB53084.title: Element 076: Osmium
moni.quest.0A8179C319A6868E.description1: The &6Steam Grinder&r functions as 5.3 &7LV &3Macerators&r in parallel! It requires an input of &9Steam&r through a &eSteam Hatch&r, but it uses very little Steam.
The &6Steam Grinder&r functions as 5.3 &7LV &3Macerators&r in parallel! It requires an input of &9Steam&r through a &eSteam Hatch&r.
moni.quest.0A8179C319A6868E.description2: You may want to consider setting up a rudimentary &eore-doubling&r setup with it. Point the output in the direction of several upgraded &3Furnaces&r.
You may want to consider setting up a rudimentary &eore-doubling&r setup with it. Point the output in the direction of several upgraded &3Furnaces&r.
moni.quest.0A8179C319A6868E.description3: &4Does not generate byproducts!&r You need an HV-tier macerator or higher to get some.
&4Does not generate byproducts!&r You need an HV-tier macerator or higher to get some.
moni.quest.0A8179C319A6868E.description4: You may wish to wait until you have a Bender at LV to reduce the cost.
You may wish to wait until you have a Bender at LV to reduce the cost.
moni.quest.0A9BC922CF76F48A.title: &9Signalum Backpack
moni.quest.0B37518A984D386F.subtitle: unlocks em only quests
moni.quest.0B37518A984D386F.title: &eExpert Mode
moni.quest.0B51A633811472A2.title: Living Solder
moni.quest.0B51A633811472A2.subtitle: Blood for the Machine
moni.quest.0B51A633811472A2.description1: The final tier of Soldering Alloy. Requires &6Stem Cells&r, so you'll need to spend some time dealing with Biochemistry to get some.
moni.quest.0B5613CC79261800.description1: &2With LV power, you can only get Aluminium Dust from electrolyzing Sapphire Dust or Green Sapphire Dust. Once you make an MV Electrolyzer, you can get it from a plethora of other raw resources, such as Clay.&r
moni.quest.0B6196692F9E176D.description1: &2Double Plates&r used for the Tier Seven Microminer.
moni.quest.0B6196692F9E176D.title: &9Cryolobus Double Plates
moni.quest.0B62AD25CDD86A6B.description1: Remember to keep the MV area separate from your LV area. &eHooking up an LV machine to MV current will result in the machine being destroyed! Also, LV cables will burn up if you put MV current through them&r. That's why it's probably best to keep the areas separate until you're comfortable and confident with voltages. Eventually, you can use transformers to switch voltages within a single setup, but don't feel forced to try that until you've got a grasp on the basics.
moni.quest.0B62AD25CDD86A6B.description2: All RF power is the same — any RF supplier can send energy to any RF receiver without consequence. This means you can use LaserIO to route power from wherever you're generating it to an &3Energy Converter&r for each tier of GregTech machine you have. You don't have to use this setup, but it's the most foolproof one for a beginner.
moni.quest.0B62AD25CDD86A6B.description3: For your MV cables, you can use &6Copper&r to start with. &6Energetic Alloy cables&r are lossless though, so consider them if you're able to mass produce those ingots.
moni.quest.0B62AD25CDD86A6B.title: MV Energy Converter
moni.quest.0B6ACDE565DB7862.description1: &6&6Redstone&r, &6Saltpeter&r, and &6Blitz Powder&r creates &6Aerotheum Dust&r, a mixture imbued with potent elemental air.
moni.quest.0B8CE3FBF62B099D.description1: &6Epoxy Circuit Boards&r are a more advanced substrate type that gives you access to &2Nanocircuits, which span tiers three through six.
moni.quest.0B8CE3FBF62B099D.title: &2Epoxy Substrate
moni.quest.0B923E8ED6161CA8.description1: Circuits along this line are UEV, and can all be substituted in recipes.
moni.quest.0B923E8ED6161CA8.title: &9UEV Circuits
moni.quest.0B9D5F865C3F8B31.description1: Made by adding some &6Iridium&r and &6Osmium&r to your &6HSS-G&r.
moni.quest.0B9D5F865C3F8B31.title: High Speed Steel Type S
moni.quest.0BB798ACFE684AA9.description1: With your &2Rhodium Plated Lumium-Palladium&r-based machine hulls, Assembling Machine built, and &6Quantum Processor Mainframes&r squared away, you can finally get on the path to making a Ludicrous Voltage &3Circuit Assembling Machine&r.
moni.quest.0BB798ACFE684AA9.description2: This tier of Assembling Machine unlocks &6Crystal Circuits&r, as well as handling crafting recipes up to LuV. It can also optionally overclock recipes that consume up to IV power for improved speed at the cost of relatively more power.
moni.quest.0BB798ACFE684AA9.description3: Alternatively, you can make a &6LuV Energy Hatch&r and use the &3Large Circuit Assembling Factory&r instead.
moni.quest.0BB798ACFE684AA9.title: &2LuV Circuit Assembler
moni.quest.0BEEC4D7F9839411.title: Element 016: Sulfur
moni.quest.0BFAE16A8B131E84.description1: The Extreme Combustion Engine is a direct upgrade to the Large Combustion Engine.
moni.quest.0BFAE16A8B131E84.description2: It produces &e4x&r the power for &e4x&r as much fuel like any other generator upgrade, but consumes the same amount of &9Lubricant&r.
moni.quest.0BFAE16A8B131E84.description3: Additionally, supercharging with liquid &9Oxygen&r is more efficient.
moni.quest.0BFAE16A8B131E84.rich_descrip: As for fuels, you should look into
. It's a potent concoction of exotic and dangerous ingredients, but will last for quite some time even in these generators.
moni.quest.0C08F09EBCDFDAD0.description2: These Crafting Units can be crafted with &eMEGA Cell Storage Components&r to make even larger crafting units.
moni.quest.0C08F09EBCDFDAD0.title: &9MEGA Crafting
moni.quest.0C10EC03A01E7334.description2: &6Uraninite Ore&r is the first source of &6Pulsating Dust&r but is not a very good one in the long term. Instead you should make &6Resonant Clathrates&r, which are an infinitely-renewable and effective source of Pulsating Dust.
moni.quest.0C10EC03A01E7334.description3: Resonant Clathrates are made by melting &6Ender Pearls&r with a &3Fluid Extractor&r into &9Resonant Ender&r, then mixing that with &6Nether Quartz&r in an MV or better &3Chemical Reactor&r. Smelting this clathrate gives Pulsating Dust.
moni.quest.0C10EC03A01E7334.description4: With Resonant Clathrates now accessible, everything you need for crafting &6Pulsating Prediction Matrix&r can be automated in a net-positive loop.&r Doing so is the first step in automation of &bHostile Neural Networks&r, which is &ea primary source of important materials for the rest of the pack&r.
moni.quest.0C10EC03A01E7334.description5: The exact implementation is up to you. Make use of the various LV and MV machines you have, and look through &bEMI&r and the Processing Lines Tab for the ways to get infinite sources of each ingredient (like &aEnderman Models&r for pearls).
moni.quest.0C10EC03A01E7334.rich_descrip: This is an important part of a Processing Line. Visit the
tab to have more info, useful tips, and a visual representation of how to passively automate this.
moni.quest.0C173EF148EFEF8E.description2: These are quests for a full stack of many of the materials in the game. Those are the materials you'll be able to use to synthesize &6Omnium&r, an important endgame resource. It's the pack's way of letting you know about materials you should be prepared to mass produce as you approach the end.
moni.quest.0C173EF148EFEF8E.description3: Of course, it's not necessary or even advisable to try to finish up all of these quests the moment they become available. Some will be incredibly easy (like &6Iron&f and &6Copper&f), while others will be brutally grindy at early tech levels. The rewards are all the same: &91 Moniquarter each&f, so use your best judgement on which ones to complete and which to ignore for later.

Of course, it's not necessary or even advisable to try to finish up all of these quests the moment they become available. Some will be incredibly easy (like &6Iron&f and &6Copper&f), others will be brutally grindy at early tech levels.

Of course, it's not necessary or even advisable to try to finish up all of these quests the moment they become available. Some will be incredibly easy (like &6Iron&f and &6Copper&f), others will be brutally grindy at early tech levels.
moni.quest.0C173EF148EFEF8E.rich_descrip: Click to go to the chapter
Elements and Alloys quest book tab
. This might seem a bit premature to suggest, but it has a reason.
moni.quest.0C173EF148EFEF8E.title: Elements and Alloys
moni.quest.05F7C3F397B329F5.description1: With two &9IV &6Energy Hatches&r on a &3Large Chemical Bath&r, you are now able to break down &6Rarest Metal Mixture&r, which you have been getting from your pre-existing Platline.
moni.quest.05F7C3F397B329F5.description2: From Rarest Metal Mixture, you can extract &6Iridium&r and &6Osmium&r, vital materials for the upcoming tiers.
moni.quest.05F7C3F397B329F5.description3: You will need a lot of &6Rarest Metal Mixture&r for this, so now would also be a good time to upgrade your &6Platinum Group Sludge&r processing chain with multiblock machines if you haven't yet.
moni.quest.05F7C3F397B329F5.title: Rarest Metal Mixture Processing
moni.quest.0C4E18B05F9E68DE.description1: &2The next tier of Assembling Machine. This one can make quite a few nice things - check the surrounding quests.
moni.quest.0C4E18B05F9E68DE.title: HV Assembler
moni.quest.0C50D78D8F63CAFE.description1: Circuits along this line are UHV, and can all be substituted in recipes.
moni.quest.0C50D78D8F63CAFE.title: &9UHV Circuits
moni.quest.0C9A9F33EEA3AB5E.description1: Combining &6Wetware&r bioengineering technologies with non-Euclidian spaces together allows you to assemble the &6Extradimensional Processor Supercomputer&r.
moni.quest.0C9A9F33EEA3AB5E.title: &9The Second Tier Ten Circuit
moni.quest.0CEF53164D8B6496.description1: Once you scan and make your first &6UV Circuits&r and &6ZPM Field Generators&r, you can upgrade your &3HPCA Computing Components&r to &3Advanced Components&r. These produce &d16 CWU/t&r each and require &d4 Cooling&r each.
moni.quest.0CEF53164D8B6496.description2: With them, you can upgrade a single HPCA to produce &d48 CWU/t&r total - enough for basic &6UV components&r and the &3Network Switch&r, which will allow you to go higher.
moni.quest.0CEF53164D8B6496.title: &2Advanced HPCA
moni.quest.0D0A0C18ED958511.description1: Mixing &9Diesel&r (or less efficiently, &9Bio Diesel&r) with &9Tetranitromethane&r in an &3HV Mixer&r &2or Large Chemical Reactor&r produces &2Cetane-Boosted Diesel&r, an extremely potent fuel.
moni.quest.0D0A0C18ED958511.description2: If you have a very robust petrochemical infrastructure and can afford to burn it, this fuel along with proper oxygenation &2is a potent fuel in the Large Combustion Engine and Extreme Combustion Engine, producing &2720 EU/mB of fuel.
moni.quest.0D0A0C18ED958511.subtitle: You will need either Diesel or Biodiesel
moni.quest.0D0A0C18ED958511.title: &2CETANE-BOOSTED DIESEL!!
moni.quest.0D1A64EBBA742196.description1: &bApplied Energistics&r does not allow you to use tags when creating &6Processing Patterns&r. This can become annoying when dealing with recipes that use Gregtech Circuits, as normally you would have to remake your patterns when you unlock a new tier of circuit.
moni.quest.0D1A64EBBA742196.description2: &eIf you find this to be an issue, use &9Universal Circuits&e for Processing Patterns that would otherwise use GregTech circuits.&r
moni.quest.0D1A64EBBA742196.description3: All normal circuits can be converted to their &9Universal Circuit&r equivalent, and thus when a more efficient circuit can be made, only the recipe for the &9Universal Circuit&r needs to be changed.
moni.quest.0D1A64EBBA742196.title: &9Universal Circuits
moni.quest.0D552ECAE4FC617B.title: Element 023: Vanadium
moni.quest.0D6C8FFD01BE5C21.description1: The main function of this oven is to increase the fuel values of your wood and coal while also recovering some of the various potentially useful waste products.
moni.quest.0D6C8FFD01BE5C21.description2: Turning &6Coal&r into &6Coal Coke&r will not only make it more useful as fuel, but will also produce &9Phenol&r, which you'll need for circuits.
moni.quest.0D6C8FFD01BE5C21.description3: The Pyrolyse Oven is also the source of several other fluids that can be distilled for useful ingredients.
moni.quest.0D6C8FFD01BE5C21.description4: Remember that Hatches and Buses can be replaced by Hatches and Buses of any tier, and that you can &6sneak-right click&r the controller to enable the in-world preview.
moni.quest.0D6C8FFD01BE5C21.description5: &2As stated in the tooltip, higher tier coils will make this faster.
moni.quest.0D6C8FFD01BE5C21.title: &2Pyrolyse Oven
moni.quest.0D732BC5312234B4.title: Element 041: Niobium
moni.quest.0DB13ACF2241345E.title: Element 060: Neodymium
moni.quest.0DB8063A7972E1C0.description1: With access to &6Diamond Components&r, &3Auto Crafting Tables&r are now an option for automation of any size of crafting table - including 3x3.
moni.quest.0DB8063A7972E1C0.description2: Every &3Auto Crafting Table&r comes with three recipe slots in the top-right corner. To configure a recipe, the crafting grid must be filled with the recipe you wish to automate, and then saved to the table by &8Shift-Left-Clicking&r one of those recipe slots.
moni.quest.0DB8063A7972E1C0.description3: Saved recipes must then be selected with a &8Left-Click&r to indicate that that recipe should be crafted. Only one recipe can be selected at a time.
moni.quest.0DB8063A7972E1C0.description4: Lastly, place an inventory atop the table - The &3Auto Crafting Table&r cannot be inserted to, and &ecan only pull items from that inventory&r. At this point you can put ingredients in the inventory and &aRF&r power in the table to begin automated crafting.
moni.quest.0DB8063A7972E1C0.description5: In compensation for the cost of confusing logistics, these tables have throughput capabilities comparable to fully-accelerated &3Molecular Assemblers&r.
moni.quest.0DB8063A7972E1C0.title: Auto Crafting Tables
moni.quest.0DE1BF1648CAF6D6.description1: Thankfully, &6Necrosiderite&r itself does not require any special processing, and can just be smelted.
moni.quest.0DE1BF1648CAF6D6.description2: Necrosiderite will see use in the next tier of SMDs and various things requiring strong magnetic fields, as well as being the only &2UIV&r wire.
moni.quest.0DE1BF1648CAF6D6.subtitle: Tastes like batteries.
moni.quest.0DE1BF1648CAF6D6.title: &9Necrosiderite
moni.quest.0DE9B264A3BA75BB.rich_descrip: , allowing for quick, customizable, and easy sorting of any inventory! The default keybind is
moni.quest.0DE9B264A3BA75BB.subtitle: Clean your inventory
moni.quest.0DE9B264A3BA75BB.title: Inventory Sorting
moni.quest.0E010F5348FC89BF.description1: &6Sulfur&r will be used in a variety of upcoming chemical reactions.
moni.quest.0E010F5348FC89BF.description2: It can be electrolyzed easily from &6Sphalerite&r (which also provides &6Gallium&r), &6Cinnabar&r, and &6Pyrite&r. Alternately, Sulfur can be acquired through &bHNN&r in Normal Mode.
moni.quest.0E010F5348FC89BF.title: Sulfur
moni.quest.0E20199737DFE4AC.description1: &2Light Fuel's distillates are now more useful, and it is the only source of Octane for High-Octane Gasoline.
moni.quest.0E20199737DFE4AC.description2: But if you choose to produce Diesel, a large proportion of the Light Fuel you produce still has to go into Diesel production.
moni.quest.0E20199737DFE4AC.title: &2Light Fuel
moni.quest.0E419DD2C6D58F49.description1: Bits of a &6Blizz Cube&r. Using a &3Macerator&r doubles your yield.
moni.quest.0E75B671DAC85309.description1: &bThermal Expansion&r's &6Steam Turbines&r are the easiest way to start generating &aFE&r.
moni.quest.0E75B671DAC85309.description2: &9Steam&r can be input on any side other than the direction the red Excitation Coil faces, since it's reserved for &aRF&r output.
moni.quest.0E75B671DAC85309.description3: Note that all steam turbines accept any type of &9Steam&r, including those from &bGregTech&r boilers.
moni.quest.0E9B96B17D140B99.title: Polyether Ether Ketone
moni.quest.0E9B96B17D140B99.subtitle: Plastic at its peek.
moni.quest.0E9B96B17D140B99.description1: Also known as PEEK, this plastic will be used for coating cables of &4UHV&r+ voltage and as an incredibly fast item pipe.
moni.quest.0E9B96B17D140B99.description2: &6Actitvated Fluorotoluene Mixture Cells&r are obtained by running &6Fluorotoluene Mixture Cells&r through a &3laser engraver&r with a &6black lens&r. Fill cells with fluids using a &3canner&r.
moni.quest.0ED041E2114F7C84.description1: This material sees use in UEV Tier components.
moni.quest.0ED041E2114F7C84.description2:
This material is made up of a &6Amalgamated Sculk&r and &6Bioalloy Base&r in the Sculk Vat.
Now might be a good time to try to refine your SVat automation setups if you're so inclined.
moni.quest.0ED041E2114F7C84.subtitle: Slightly… gooey?
moni.quest.0ED041E2114F7C84.title: &9Sculk Bioalloy
moni.quest.0EDFB0C24B9129AB.description1: The &6Forge Hammer&r, despite being inefficient at making plates, can be used to break Cobblestone into Gravel and Gravel into Sand. It's also used to combine 2 Rods into 1 Long Rod.
moni.quest.0EDFB0C24B9129AB.title: &2Forge Hammer
moni.quest.0EF85170074E70B3.description1: This quest teaches you the basics about &bApplied Energistics 2&r autocrafting. If you are new to this mod, it is highly recommended that you watch a video or &3&lread the built-in guide&r&r. Just remember that channels are disabled by default in this pack.

Eventually, you'll need a lot of &6Patterns&r, lots of CPUs, and ones with more storage, and lots of &6&6&6Pattern Providers&r&r&r. If you run out of pattern slots in an &6Pattern Provider&r, you can add more &6Pattern Providers&r, or use &6Extended Pattern Providers&r, which have 36 slots each.
moni.quest.0EF85170074E70B3.description2: By now, you should have &6ME Pattern Providers, &6Molecular Assemblers, Crafting Units, Patterns&r and a &6Pattern Encoding Terminal&r.
moni.quest.0EF85170074E70B3.description3: First, for all crafts, you'll need a &eCrafting CPU&r. These are structures that must be in a solid rectangular prism composed of:
moni.quest.0EF85170074E70B3.description4: &6* Crafting Storages&r, which determine how big a craft can be. For now, &64k Crafting Storages&r should be enough. You must have at least one per CPU.
moni.quest.0EF85170074E70B3.description5: &6* Co-Processing Units&r, which allow the system to start multiple crafting steps at once. While these are optional, they greatly speed up crafting once your machines are fast enough to keep up.
moni.quest.0EF85170074E70B3.description6: &6* Crafting Monitors&r, used to see what is crafting. Not needed, and you can right-click on the CPU to find out what is crafting anyways, so this is pretty much just decoration.
moni.quest.0EF85170074E70B3.description7: &6* Crafting Units&r, which aren't needed at all, and are just used to fill holes if you have a lack of materials.
moni.quest.0EF85170074E70B3.description8: Second, you'll need the place for the autocrafting. For Crafting Table recipes, you'll need &6Molecular Assemblers&r. &6Pattern Providers&r are placed next to them. Autocrafting with &bGregTech&r is explained later, in the quest following this one.
moni.quest.0EF85170074E70B3.description9:
Finally, you'll need a &6Pattern&r. In order to make this, put empty &6Patterns&r in the &6Pattern Encoding Terminal&r, and find the recipe in &bEMI&r, while still in the &6Pattern Encoding Terminal&r. Then, click '+' in &bEMI&r, and press the arrow to encode the recipe. This goes in the &6Pattern Provider&r that you set up in the last step. You can use &6Pattern Access Terminals&r to access &6Pattern Providers'&r pattern slots.
&2While there are not many use cases for this, you can also manually encode patterns by adding items to individual slots in the Encoding Terminal.&r
moni.quest.0F56F4E642BC2B85.description1: Crafted from the aforementioned Circuit Boards, these Processing Units will be used to create &6Optical Circuits&r.
moni.quest.0F56F4E642BC2B85.title: &9Optical Processing Unit
moni.quest.0F6B344C265D1FBB.description1: Each craft in an &dLuV &3Chemical Reactor&r takes five minutes, so it's probably a good idea to have a machine passively running this recipe. At least you're guaranteed &264 from a craft.
moni.quest.0F6B344C265D1FBB.subtitle: Just ignore the protesters outside your base.
moni.quest.0F779BEEED8E67BB.description1: &2Large Turbines are decently powerful in GTm. They are quite complex to run, but can generate lots of power when done well and scale very well.&r
moni.quest.0F779BEEED8E67BB.rich_descrip: Right now, you can make the
moni.quest.0F779BEEED8E67BB.description2: Each Large Turbine will need a &3Rotor Holder&r of the same or higher tier than the Large Turbine itself, and a &3Dynamo Hatch&r capable of handling the energy output. Each &3Rotor Holder&r tier above the Large Turbine &9doubles&r the energy production and adds 10%% to fuel efficiency.
moni.quest.0F779BEEED8E67BB.description3: You will need a &aRotor&r to go into each &3Rotor Holder&r&r. The Rotor will grant multiplicative Power and Efficiency bonuses depending on its material. Each Rotor also has a Durability, which is the number of seconds it will last.
moni.quest.0F779BEEED8E67BB.description4: &aExample: &r&6Large Gas Turbine&r, with &3HSS-E Rotor&r and &3IV Rotor Holder&r:
moni.quest.0F779BEEED8E67BB.description8: You can run the &6Large Gas Turbine&r off &9LPG&r and &9Methane&r from &3Fluid Rigs&r, or &9Nitrobenzene&r from &6Wood&r.
moni.quest.0F779BEEED8E67BB.description9: The best &6Large Steam Turbine&r fuel is a closely-guarded government secret.
moni.quest.0F779BEEED8E67BB.title: &2Large Turbines
moni.quest.0FA4CAD4F68BC0F8.description1: This version of the Pattern Provider boosts the pattern capacity from 9 to 36. It can be made directly, or it can be upgraded to using a &6Pattern Provider Upgrade&r.
moni.quest.0FA4CAD4F68BC0F8.subtitle: A very useful upgrade to the Pattern Provider.
moni.quest.0FA4CAD4F68BC0F8.title: &9Extended Pattern Provider
moni.quest.0FA959478905FFF3.description1: The &3Alloy Blast Smelter&r directly smelts dust combinations into molten Alloys, skipping the Mixer step, and applying a 3/4 discount to your EBF time. Some molten alloys may need to be cooled in a Vacuum Freezer before being usable, though they take much less time than freezing Hot Ingots.
moni.quest.0FA959478905FFF3.description2: This is the only way to create some of the advanced alloys used in multiblock machines. You can also use it for most normal alloys if you want, such as &6Invar&r, &6Conductive Iron&r, and &6Dark Steel&r.
moni.quest.0FA959478905FFF3.title: &2Alloy Blast Smelter
moni.quest.0FD9B533BB402B17.description1: Using a Shattered Microverse and a &6Tier Eleven Microminer&r, &6Alien Scrap&r can be retrieved. Scrap can be sifted into various bits of ruined tech, each of which go through their own miniature processing line to be recycled into &6Necrosiderite&r.
moni.quest.0FD9B533BB402B17.description2: Scrap processing can also yield a variety of other important elements.
moni.quest.0FD9B533BB402B17.description3: &6Ruined Hulls&r are more abundant than &6Ruined Machine Parts&r but give less &6Necrosiderite&r overall. They also give high-end materials such as &6Neutronium&r, &6Tritanium&r, and &6Crystal Matrix&r
moni.quest.0FD9B533BB402B17.description4: &6Ruined Machine Parts&r provide greater amounts of &6Necrosiderite&r compared to &6Ruined Hulls&r.
moni.quest.0FD9B533BB402B17.title: &9Scrapping
moni.quest.0FF18D13CD42F48A.description1: Feeding a &3Steam Dynamo&f with water by hand is a pretty silly idea.
Feeding &3Steam producers&r with water by hand is a pretty silly idea.
Feeding &3Steam producers&r with water by hand is a pretty silly idea.
moni.quest.0FF18D13CD42F48A.description2: A &6Water Collector&f will take care of that for you, albeit slowly. It does, however, auto-output the water, making it simple to use.
A &2Primitive Water Pump&r will take care of that for you.
A &2Primitive Water Pump&r will take care of that for you.
moni.quest.0FF18D13CD42F48A.description3: &2GTm has a Primitive Water Pump, which can do it faster. However, it requires Treated Wood, which requires Creosote from a Coke Oven.
moni.quest.0FF18D13CD42F48A.title: &9Infinite Water
moni.quest.102BE3675105B9F5.title: Element 015: Phosphorus
moni.quest.1040D941027962B1.description1: &aME Pattern Providers&r, like &aME Interfaces&r, are extremely important for automation. You'll be making a lot of these, if you're playing the pack right.
moni.quest.1040D941027962B1.description2: These can be filled with encoded &aPatterns&r to perform on-demand autocrafting. Any item pushed into an &aME Pattern Provider&r is digitized and placed in your ME Network storage.
moni.quest.1040D941027962B1.description3: When adjacent to one or more &aMolecular Assemblers&r, &3Crafting Table&r and &3Stonecutter&r patterns can be crafted. It will use as many adjacent &aMolecular Assemblers&r as possible, restricted by availability and number of &aCo-processors&r in your crafting CPU multiblock.
moni.quest.1040D941027962B1.description4: When adjacent to any other block, you can use &aprocessing patterns&r with a machine to insert items into the machine. Processing patterns require that the finished item is inserted back into the ME Network through &aInterfaces&r or &aPattern Providers&r.
moni.quest.1040D941027962B1.description5: &aME Pattern Providers&r can be wrenched to ensure they only communicate with a particular adjacent block, or can be crafted into a micropart form to fit multiple in the same block space (each micropart only interacting with the adjacent block face).
moni.quest.1040D941027962B1.subtitle: &lNot&r an Interface
moni.quest.1040D941027962B1.title: &9Pattern Provider
moni.quest.1062A387E899434C.description1: Just as with Overworldian mob data, there's no huge rush or need to focus on these. Just run them while you work on other projects.
moni.quest.1062A387E899434C.title: &4Nether&r Mobs
moni.quest.10722CBC4DAD28F4.description1: You'll need &9Chlorine&r at this point. It is an important ingredient in many chemical processes, and you can currently get it from electrolyzing either &6Salt&r or &6Rock Salt&r.
moni.quest.10722CBC4DAD28F4.description2: &2Later, you can use Fluid Rigs or break down Ghast Tears to obtain Salt Water, and electrolyze it to Chlorine.
moni.quest.10722CBC4DAD28F4.description3: &rUsing Fluid Rigs is the best way to obtain mass amounts of Chlorine.
moni.quest.10722CBC4DAD28F4.title: &2Chlorine
moni.quest.1109CFC5D47FC011.description1: The &3Research Station&r is an advanced Scanner which consumes &dComputation Work&r provided by connected &3High Performance Computing Arrays&r to research &cZPM&r and higher items.
moni.quest.1109CFC5D47FC011.description2: The function of this multiblock is similar to the Scanner. Place the &6Data Orb&r or &6Data Module&r into the &3Object Holder&r alongside the item to be scanned. After sufficient &dCWU&r has been drawn, the item will be &cconsumed&r and the corresponding data will be written to the data item. Ensure your &3HPCA&r is supplying sufficient &dCWU/t&r - check the scan recipe in &eEMI&r for how much is required.
moni.quest.1109CFC5D47FC011.description3: &3Energy&r, &3Maintenance&r, and &3Computation Hatches&r can only replace the 9 &aComputer Casings&r between the &aComputer Heat Vents&r at the back of the structure. The &3Object Holder&r &cmust face&r the &3Research Station&r controller block.
moni.quest.1109CFC5D47FC011.description4: The Research Station can be accelerated with excess &dCWU/t&r, but it &cdoes not overclock&r with extra &dEU/t&r. Initial recipes run on &dLuV&r power, but &cZPM&r will be required soon, and higher tiers of energy will be required for more advanced scans. As most Research scans take a long time, you should start this process early.
moni.quest.1109CFC5D47FC011.title: &2Research Station
moni.quest.10E63A0428E6BA25.title: &2Power Transfer Einstein-Rosen Bridge
moni.quest.11124D8CC9403E67.description1: With your &2Omnium&r-based machine hulls, Assembling Machine built, and &6Dimensional Processor Mainframes&r squared away, you can finally get on the path to making a Ultra Extreme Voltage &3Circuit Assembling Machine&r.
moni.quest.11124D8CC9403E67.description2: This tier of Assembling Machine unlocks &6Monic Circuits&r, as well as handling crafting recipes up to 8388608 EU/t. It can also optionally overclock recipes that consume up to 2097152 EU/t for improved speed at the cost of relatively more power.
moni.quest.11124D8CC9403E67.description3: Alternatively, you can make a &6UEV Energy Hatch&r and use the &3Large Circuit Assembling Factory&r instead.
moni.quest.11124D8CC9403E67.title: &2UEV Circuit Assembler
moni.quest.11154356854B64DA.description1: You'll need an HV or better &3Chemical Bath&r to make these. The recipe is quite slow, so invest in the highest tier Chemical Baths you can and consider parallelizing the recipe.
moni.quest.11154356854B64DA.subtitle: When &6Ender Eyes&r just aren't creepy enough.
moni.quest.113E9543ADB1666B.subtitle: Just like how the Ancient Builders used to make it.
moni.quest.113E9543ADB1666B.description1: &6Ancient Debris Dust&r can be processed into &6Ardite Dust&r and &6Activated Netherite Scrap&r, used for &6Manyullyn&r and &6Activated Netherite&r respectively.
moni.quest.113E9543ADB1666B.description2: There are two paths when processing Ancient Debris Dust, putting it into an &3EBF&r or a &3Chemical Bath&r. The EBF will grant more Activated Netherite Scrap, at the cost of less Ardite, and the other way around for the Chemical Bath.
moni.quest.113E9543ADB1666B.description3: Smithing Table recipes can be automated using &6Molecular Assemblers&r.
moni.quest.113E9543ADB1666B.title: &9Activated Netherite and Manyullyn
moni.quest.114B300F56E48351.description1: This &3Personal Shrinking Device&r can grow or shrink your size.
moni.quest.114B300F56E48351.description2: With the device in-hand, open its GUI with &8Right-click&r and use the buttons to specify a factor to scale your size by. &8Shift-Right-click&r to activate.
moni.quest.114B300F56E48351.description3: Very useful for fitting between cables and pipes!
moni.quest.115B96B2092D671E.description1: The &6Crystal Processor Mainframe&r is the first Tier Eight circuit.
moni.quest.115B96B2092D671E.description2: To get the data needed to assemble these, you will need an &3HPCA&r and the &3Research Station&r.
moni.quest.115B96B2092D671E.description3: These are required for crafting the &3ZPM Circuit Assembler&r and &3Mk2 Fusion Reactor&r. As usual, these are extremely expensive: invest in the next theme of circuits instead of trying to mass-produce these.
moni.quest.115B96B2092D671E.title: &2The First Tier Eight Circuits
moni.quest.115D2BEB18929C7C.description1: While there are no types of veins that are extremely rare, you're likely to struggle with finding at least one of the less common vein types. This isn't really avoidable.
moni.quest.115D2BEB18929C7C.rich_descrip: You will accumulate a lot of
Search for various ores (generally the first one listed in
) to find the coin recipes for them. Alternatively, hover your cursor over a coin and press
to see what you can buy with it.
moni.quest.115D2BEB18929C7C.subtitle: Don't be a hoarder!
moni.quest.115D2BEB18929C7C.title: Spend Your Coins!
moni.quest.1175ED9EF0AB82F6.description1: Accessing &bApplied Energistics 2&r wirelessly saves a huge amount of time, and is highly recommended to set up.
moni.quest.1175ED9EF0AB82F6.description2: First, you will need a &6Wireless Access Point&r. Connect it to your network. Like the &6Terminal&r, the Wireless Access Point is a &emicropart&r, so you must place it on a &6ME Cable&r.
moni.quest.1175ED9EF0AB82F6.description3: Next, you need a &6Wireless Terminal&r, or any of its variants. You can have as many Wireless Terminals connected to the system as you want.
moni.quest.1175ED9EF0AB82F6.description4: Finally, put your &6Wireless Terminal&r into the &6Wireless Access Point&r. This will connect it to the system.
moni.quest.1175ED9EF0AB82F6.description5: You can equip these as a Curio, and &3use a hotkey to open them&r. Search '&3Applied Energistics&r' as a &ecategory&r to see and edit these hotkeys.
moni.quest.1175ED9EF0AB82F6.description6: The default range is only 16 blocks. However, you can put &6Wireless Boosters&r into the &6Wireless Access Point&r to increase the range. A better (but more expensive) solution that allows access from anywhere will be explained in the following quest, 'AE2 Everywhere!'.
moni.quest.1175ED9EF0AB82F6.description7: &9Building Gadgets can be bound to the ME system by &8Shift-right-clicking&9 with it on an online ME Wireless Access Point.&r
moni.quest.1175ED9EF0AB82F6.subtitle: AE2 from anywhere… almost.
moni.quest.1175ED9EF0AB82F6.title: Wireless Terminal
moni.quest.119C529A35758AF2.title: Element ???: Duranium
moni.quest.11B25506F679ACBD.description2: In this age, you should continue to expand and upgrade your &3Fusion&r infrastructure to support the gathering of your first endgame materials like &6Hadal Shards&r, &6Cryococcus&r, &6Omnium&r, and &6Neutronium&r.
moni.quest.11B25506F679ACBD.title: &cZPM&r Age
moni.quest.11FDFB08CD48D66E.description1: The MAX voltage lacks machines to call its own, with the primary usage of its circuits being to craft &6MAX Energy Hatches&r and the &9Creative Quantum Chest&r.
moni.quest.11FDFB08CD48D66E.subtitle: There can be only one!
moni.quest.11FDFB08CD48D66E.title: &9MAX Circuit
moni.quest.1207189AD233A746.description1: &6Nano CPUs&r are advanced &6Circuit Wafers&r made from infusing a &6CPU Wafer&r with &6Carbon Fibers&r and &6Liquid Glowstone&r in a &3Chemical Reactor&r.
moni.quest.1207189AD233A746.description2: Then, cut the resulting wafer into dies using a &3Cutting Machine&r.
moni.quest.1229234A71CE0A99.description1: &6Redstone&f: Exclusively found in massive veins paired with &6Cinnabar&f and &6Ruby&f, slightly above the Deepslate layer.
moni.quest.1229234A71CE0A99.description2: &6Copper&f: Two primary sources. &6Tetrahedrite&f veins are higher up, while &6Chalcopyrite&f veins are lower, paired with some small amounts of &6Iron&f. You'll also find &6Malachite&f inside of Iron veins; this is another type of copper ore.

&6Copper&f: Two primary sources. &6Tetrahedrite&f veins are higher up, while &6Chalcopyrite&f veins are lower, paired with some small amounts of &6Iron&f. You'll also find &6Malachite&f inside of Iron veins; this is another type of copper ore.

&6Copper&f: Two primary sources. &6Tetrahedrite&f veins are higher up, while &6Chalcopyrite&f veins are lower, paired with some small amounts of &6Iron&f. You'll also find &6Malachite&f inside of Iron veins; this is another type of copper ore.
moni.quest.1229234A71CE0A99.description3: &6Tin&f: Found essentially at ground level. &6Cassiterite&f is another type of tin ore, and they're always found together. If you cannot find a vein of tin, there are small amounts of tin inside veins of &6Aluminium&f and &6Rock Salt&f, which might be enough to hold you over until you find a proper tin vein.
moni.quest.1229234A71CE0A99.description5: &6Gold&f: Found inside of &6Magnetite&f veins, relatively close to the surface.
moni.quest.1229234A71CE0A99.subtitle: Before you continue, you'll need access to some more materials.
moni.quest.1229234A71CE0A99.title: More Materials
moni.quest.12602DA0FD3D8349.title: Element 078: Platinum
moni.quest.126772F682B282E4.description1: The &eNether&r contains quite a few useful resources:
The &eNether&r contains quite a few useful resources:
moni.quest.126772F682B282E4.description5: - &2Nether Air&r, which can later be distilled for useful gases
- &2Nether Air&r, which can be distilled for useful gases
moni.quest.126ED4A0AEA05DCD.description1: Components can be applied to &bThermal Expansion&r Dynamos and machines.
moni.quest.126ED4A0AEA05DCD.description2: When applied to a dynamo, it increases the &apower generation and fuel burn rate to 150%%&r.
moni.quest.126ED4A0AEA05DCD.description3: Allows machines to operate at &a150%% of their base power per tick&r. The more power a machine can use, the faster it works.
moni.quest.126ED4A0AEA05DCD.subtitle: What?! &6STEAM DYNAMO&r is evolving!
moni.quest.1289F9FE461BFE01.description1: &6Wetware Processor Assemblies&r are made in a &cZPM&r+ &3Circuit Assembler&r still. At this point, if you are not already using a &3Large Circuit Assembling Factory&r to perform your Circuit Assembler recipes, you really should be.
moni.quest.1289F9FE461BFE01.title: &2The Third Tier Seven Circuits
moni.quest.12B896D7EF558835.title: Element 018: Argon
moni.quest.12B95158E4C792DB.description1: The most basic cables, such as these &6Red Alloy Cables&f, can be wrapped in their &6Rubber&f insulation by hand.
moni.quest.12B95158E4C792DB.description2: More advanced types of cables will require an &3Assembling Machine&f and liquid &9Rubber&f, but you can do it the simple way for now.
moni.quest.12B95158E4C792DB.description3: &2GTm has GT6-style pipes and cables on by default. &rYou will need to use &aWire Cutters&r to connect each side of a cable to machines or other cables. Placing it against the machine or cable automatically connects it as well. The same behaviour follows for GT pipes, whose tool is the &aWrench&r.
moni.quest.12B95158E4C792DB.description4: This can save you from energy or fluids going the wrong way. But if you don't like this, disable the config option for "GT6 style pipes and cables" in the GregTech config file.
moni.quest.12B95158E4C792DB.description5: &2GT cables support RF conversion natively! &eYou can plug an &9RF&e machine into an &9EU&e cable directly and it will convert the energy.&r You cannot, however, plug an &9RF&r power source directly into an &9EU&r cable.
moni.quest.12B95158E4C792DB.title: &2Cables
moni.quest.12E06D4D898F3E58.title: Bacteria
moni.quest.12E06D4D898F3E58.description1: Initially, you will need to obtain &6Bacteria&r either from &6Bio Chaff&r or &6Rotten Sludge&r. Both of these recipes must be run in a machine with a &6Sterile Cleaning Hatch&r.
moni.quest.12E06D4D898F3E58.description2: After you get a starting amount, it is highly recommended to switch to using the &3Sculk Vat&r for its speed. Just because it can grow Sculk doesn't mean it can't grow measly bacteria.
moni.quest.12E06D4D898F3E58.description3: Bacteria is used in &6Bacterial Sludge&r and &6Stem Cells&r.
moni.quest.13035465E07E34CF.description1: &6Transistors&r are semiconductors that can amplify or switch electrical signals and power. They're probably one of the most important inventions of the 20th century.
moni.quest.13035465E07E34CF.description2: You're going to use them as a component for better circuits. This one is a bit pricey, requiring &2PE, Silicon Plates and Fine Tin Wire.
moni.quest.13035465E07E34CF.title: &2Transistors
moni.quest.131EAE1541E9C780.description1: Now that you've dealt with the dragon, seek the bedrock structure floating mid-air around the edge of the main island.
moni.quest.131EAE1541E9C780.description2: Carefully throw an &6Ender Pearl&r inside one (where there's a portal-looking texture) to teleport to a distant island.
moni.quest.131EAE1541E9C780.description3: Once there, gather some &6Chorus Flowers&r. You'll have to smash the flower itself to get it: simply breaking the stem of a plant will not drop the flower.
moni.quest.131EAE1541E9C780.description4: To get back to the main island, throw an Ender Pearl into another bedrock portal structure.
moni.quest.131EAE1541E9C780.title: Chorus Flowering
moni.quest.1349044BF8C04A12.description1: The &3Soul Binder&r is an &bEnder IO&r machine which uses &aSoul Vials&r and Experience to enhance specific items.
moni.quest.1349044BF8C04A12.description2: It may be prudent to store &9Liquid XP&r in an adjacent &3Obelisk&r, which the Soul Binder can draw from directly, or you can insert it using other standard means of fluid routing.
moni.quest.1349044BF8C04A12.description3: This machine will primarily be used in making &6Prescient Crystals&r.
moni.quest.1349FBBCE3041081.description1: Break up your &6Sandstone&r into &6Saltpeter&r. This is probably the best way to get &6Saltpeter&r, which you'll need a lot of for &6Aerotheum Dust&r. If you are playing Normal Mode, you can also get &6Saltpeter&r from &bHostile Neural Networks&r.
moni.quest.1349FBBCE3041081.description2: You can also electrolyze it for &6Potassium&r, although that isn't recommended because of how easily you can get &6Potassium&r from other sources and how much &6Saltpeter&r it costs.
moni.quest.13578427FD9CC2CE.description1: The &6IPMEPS&r is capable of altering the laws of physics on a microversal scale, thus allowing the production of previously &9impossible materials&r.
moni.quest.13578427FD9CC2CE.subtitle: The final Microminer!
moni.quest.13578427FD9CC2CE.title: &9Tier Twelve Microminer
moni.quest.13B12457AA9BF90D.description1: A PackagedAuto version of the &3Crafting Core&r.
moni.quest.13B12457AA9BF90D.description2: This upgrade to the &3Crafting Core&r allows you to craft Combination recipes directly through &bPackagedAuto&r.
moni.quest.13B12457AA9BF90D.description3: The &aMarked Pedestals&r can be placed freely within three blocks' distance of the Crafting block, as long as they are on the same Y-level.
moni.quest.13B12457AA9BF90D.description4: As usual with PackagedAuto crafters, you need to encode the recipe in the correct mode and place a copy in two places: a &3Packager&r somewhere on your network, and an &3Unpackager&r adjacent to the &3Combination Package Crafter&r.
moni.quest.13B12457AA9BF90D.description5: These recipes require large amounts of RF and it &ewill not use power from your &aME Network&r, so you must also connect the package crafter directly to a source of RF.
moni.quest.3B1873913255E7C0.description1:
Although &9Biomass&r can be obtained directly through most types of plant matter, it is more efficient to turn that plant matter into &6Bio Chaff&r before putting it in the &3Brewery&r.

The &3Pyrolyse Oven&r can be used to make &9Biomass&r from &6Bio Chaff&r with a little more efficiency, but it's significantly slower.
moni.quest.13F33DCE02ECE265.description1: &2Circuit recipes are handled through a separate machine, the Circuit Assembler. They are two entirely separate machines, despite their similar name!&r
moni.quest.13F33DCE02ECE265.description2: Assembling Machines open up a plethora of &eequal or more efficient recipes that don't require hand tools&r. &2For example, you can make up to 4 Vacuum Tubes in a single craft! &rCheck EMI&r for all the components you've been making to see if the Assembler can improve their recipes.
moni.quest.13F33DCE02ECE265.description3: Many of the Assembler's recipes require &9fluids&r. Hence, the &3Extractor&r will be required to take full advantage of this machine.
moni.quest.13F33DCE02ECE265.description4: Hand tool recipes also don't play nice with &bApplied Energistics&r. Take advantage of Assembling Machines: &cphase out all use of hand tools for crafting items in your automation going forward.&r Once you have all the important machines, you will never need hand tools for crafting.
moni.quest.13F33DCE02ECE265.title: &2LV Assembling Machine
moni.quest.1405D08C6A87B3BB.description1: &3Large Plasma Turbines&r are a potent late game method of generating &aEU&r. However, they require some investment.
moni.quest.1405D08C6A87B3BB.description2: One Large Plasma Turbine produces &2a base of 16384 EU/t when using an IV Rotor Holder&r.
moni.quest.1405D08C6A87B3BB.title: &2Plasma Turbine
moni.quest.14F1FF4656693711.description1: An alloy of equal parts &6Tungsten&r and &6Carbon Dust&r.
moni.quest.14F1FF4656693711.description2: &6Tungsten Carbide&r is a very dense, sturdy, and heat-resistant material useful for a variety of applications. Tools made of Tungsten Carbide have very high mining speed.
moni.quest.14F1FF4656693711.title: Tungsten Carbide
moni.quest.14F2E61E80D231AE.title: Element 012: Magnesium
moni.quest.1510DC51CDC3F609.description1: Circuits along this line are MV, and can all be substituted in recipes.
moni.quest.1510DC51CDC3F609.description2: The pattern stays the same: the rightmost circuit comes in larger quantities and is overall easier to produce.
moni.quest.1510DC51CDC3F609.title: MV Circuits
moni.quest.15372CBC9F2EA9BC.description1: Combining &9Titanium Tetrachloride&r with &6Magnesium&r in an &3Electric Blast Furnace&r (approximating the Kroll process) will net you your first &6Titanium&r.
moni.quest.15372CBC9F2EA9BC.description2: This process is a loop, and therefore will not cost you any resources (apart from &6Rutile&r) if you process it correctly.
moni.quest.15372CBC9F2EA9BC.description3: Unfortunately, it is super hot. You'll need to cool it in a &3Vacuum Freezer&r for it to be usable.
moni.quest.15372CBC9F2EA9BC.description4: If you haven't set one up yet or want to improve your setup, routing through AE is an alternative way to using LaserIO or GT pipes. Simply set a Tag Storage Bus on the input bus of the freezer, set it to 'forge:hot_ingots', and set it to a high priority. This will accept any new Hot Ingots entering your system, and eliminates the need for a network.
moni.quest.15372CBC9F2EA9BC.description5: It also removes the need for a separate pattern dedicated to cooling the hot ingots.
moni.quest.15372CBC9F2EA9BC.title: Hot Titanium
moni.quest.153BDCAE4D1CC407.description1: &9Ethylene&r is a hydrocarbon obtained from &9Oil Processing&r, or by dehydrating &9Ethanol&r with &9Sulfuric Acid&r in a &3Chemical Reactor&r. Choose a method that works for you:
moni.quest.153BDCAE4D1CC407.description2: - The &9Ethanol&r route allows you to use your existing &6Sugarcane&r farm to produce &9Ethylene&r. However, the recipes require &bMedium Voltage&r machines to run.
moni.quest.153BDCAE4D1CC407.description3: - The &9Oil Processing&r route requires &2only LV machines&r, but you will have to source &9Oil&r, or its variants, from somewhere. &2Severely Steam-Cracked Light Fuel&r is most efficient with &9Oil and Heavy Oil&r. &2Severely Steam-Cracked Naphtha&r is more efficient when you are using &9Raw Oil and Light Oil&r.
moni.quest.153BDCAE4D1CC407.description4: It is an extremely important chemical in the production of plastics, as you'll need &9Ethylene&r in your production of &9Polyethylene (PE)&r, &9Polyvinyl Chloride (PVC)&r, and can be used in the production of &9Styrene-Butadiene Rubber (SBR)&r, the best form of rubber.
moni.quest.153BDCAE4D1CC407.title: &2Ethylene
moni.quest.15607184B546F5EE.description1: &2Tritanium Coils are the eighth coil material. At 10800K, it's capable of smelting nearly every material.
moni.quest.15607184B546F5EE.title: &2Tritanium Coils
moni.quest.15A43AB700CADF2D.title: Ironman 3
moni.quest.15A5B4C632836306.description1: Although it requires &6Blue Steel&r to make and takes up far more space, the &6Large Steam Turbine&r is far more scalable than its predecessor.
moni.quest.15A5B4C632836306.description2: Only the &6Rotor Holder&r needs upgrading every tier, improving power generation by &e2x&r each time.
moni.quest.15A5B4C632836306.description3: You should also look into the &3Large Titanium Boiler&r in the near future to produce enough &9Steam&r to feed it.
moni.quest.15A5B4C632836306.description4: Your pipes may be a bottleneck with this level of &9Steam&r throughput however, so make sure to upgrade them!
moni.quest.15AE607E2EDD0369.subtitle: The third component for AE &6Storage Cells&r.
moni.quest.15AE607E2EDD0369.title: 16k Item Storage
moni.quest.15B1277EF8657C65.description1: The final tier of Integral Components!
moni.quest.15B1277EF8657C65.description2: Dynamos operate at &a1000%% of base power generation and fuel burn rate&r.
moni.quest.15B1277EF8657C65.description3: Machines operate at &a1000%% of base speed&r.
