moni.quest.60BC08DE447E5007.title: 64k Item Storage
moni.quest.63C3077124BC81FD.title: Coal Fly Ash Processing
moni.quest.63C3077124BC81FD.description1: When burning &6Coal&r or &6Coke&r in the &3Pyrolyse Oven&r or &3Chemical Reactor&r there is a chance to produce a special type of Ash called &6Coal Fly Ash&r.
moni.quest.63C3077124BC81FD.description2: You'll regret trashing it, since this type of ash is more mineral-rich than most regular types of ash. It yields &6Nickel&r, &6Zinc&r, &6Gallium&r, &6Lithium&r, &6Vanadium&r and, most importantly, &6Germanium&r.
moni.quest.63C3077124BC81FD.description3: The full processing line will require &9Oxalic Acid Solution&r, but you've had access to that for a few tiers by now.
moni.quest.60D863C48FBFF5A3.description2: In this age, you begin to make &6Dimensional circuits&r and unlock the &3Dimensonal Superassembler&r, which helps you process the sheer number of intermediates needed to make the &6Creative Chest&r.
moni.quest.60D863C48FBFF5A3.title: &2UIV&r Age
moni.quest.61301FBD825F8280.description1: After combining several dozen elements, or less efficiently, just throwing a bunch of &6Iron&r and &6Copper&r into the &3Omnic Synthesizer&r, you get &6Omnium Nuggets&r. Those nuggets can be further compressed into an ingot form, workable like many of the metals that comprise it.
moni.quest.61301FBD825F8280.description2: Omnium will be used in increasing frequency throughout the endgame.
moni.quest.61301FBD825F8280.title: Omnium
moni.quest.616555E46F314F04.description1: &2Sodium Potassium is a mix of… take a guess.
moni.quest.616555E46F314F04.description2: &2It's used in the construction of HV and above Energy and Dynamo hatches.
moni.quest.616555E46F314F04.title: &2Sodium Potassium
moni.quest.6169C04DF463502F.description1: Your first Tier Three circuit, formed from &2two Good Integrated Circuits&r, &6RAM&r, and &6Transistors&r, among other ingredients.
moni.quest.6169C04DF463502F.description2: As you'll realize is the pattern, it is expensive and unwieldy to make the first forms of each tier of circuits. Fortunately, you don't have to make many of them.
moni.quest.6169C04DF463502F.description3: Prioritize using these circuits to make things needed for unlocking the next theme of circuits, which require more infrastructure but are much cheaper to produce. Eventually each circuit tier through Tier Eight will have a Processor recipe instead of requiring Processor Assemblies, Supercomputers, or Mainframes.
moni.quest.6169C04DF463502F.title: &2The First Tier Three Circuits
moni.quest.6197C51E04761371.description1: &2Circuit recipes are handled through a separate machine, the Circuit Assembler. They are two entirely separate machines, despite their similar name!&r
moni.quest.6197C51E04761371.description2: Assembling Machines open up a plethora of &eequal or more efficient recipes that don't require hand tools&r. &2For example, you can make up to 4 Vacuum Tubes in a single craft! &rCheck &eEMI&r for all the components you've been making to see if the Assembler can improve their recipes.
moni.quest.6197C51E04761371.description3: Many of the Assembler's recipes require &9fluids&r. Hence, the &3Extractor&r will be required to take full advantage of this machine.
moni.quest.6197C51E04761371.description4: Hand tool recipes also don't play nice with &bApplied Energistics&r. Take advantage of Assembling Machines: &cphase out all use of hand tools for crafting items in your automation going forward.&r Once you have all the important machines, you will never need hand tools for crafting.
moni.quest.6197C51E04761371.subtitle: Assembling Machine 1
moni.quest.6197C51E04761371.title: &2LV Assembling Machine
moni.quest.61AD3760E271B431.description1: When you first started the pack, we told you that ore processing can wait. Now, the wait is over. You need to start doing some rudimentary ore processing for &ebyproducts&r.

- &3Thermal Centrifuge&r: not to be confused with the regular Centrifuge. &2Less slow and power-hungry now, but still so. However, it yields a chance for byproduct, and macerating the Centrifuged Ore can grant a special third byproduct.
&2- Sifter: filters high-quality Gems from Purified Crushed gem Ores for an overall higher yield.
- Electromagnetic Separator: filters magnetic metals from certain ores, increasing their yields.&r
Your first forays into ore processing for byproducts will be the Electrolyzer and the Centrifuge.
moni.quest.61AD3760E271B431.description2:
Byproducts are additional materials that can only be obtained from processing ores in certain machines. For example, there is no "Gallium Ore" or "Arsenic Ore". You get &6Gallium&r and &6Arsenic &ras a byproduct from processing other ores.

&cYour macerator must be HV or higher to make byproducts. Other ore processing machines do not have this restriction.&r
moni.quest.61AD3760E271B431.description3: Ores have various means of processing, and eventually you'll use machine pipelines to process ores in specific ways to optimize what byproducts you gain. You can look at the &6Ore Byproduct Page&r of an ore in &bEMI&r, accessed by pressing 'U' on an ore and navigating to the byproduct tab, to see the required route to obtain desired byproducts.
moni.quest.61AD3760E271B431.description4: The relevant machines are as follows:
moni.quest.61AD3760E271B431.description5: - &3Macerator&r: turns ores into &6Crushed Ores&r, &6Crushed Ores&r into &6Impure Dusts&r, and &6Purified Crushed Ores&r into &6Pure Dusts&r. &eHV&r and above macerators have byproduct slots and gain a chance to get a full pile of byproduct from ores and both types of crushed ores.
moni.quest.61AD3760E271B431.description6: - &3Ore Washer&r: cleans Crushed Ores with &9Water&r, making Purified Crushed Ores&r, and a chance for a full pile of byproduct. Using &9Distilled Water&r makes them go faster. &2You can also perform a simple wash that is similar to Cauldron washing. It is extremely fast, but grants no byproducts.&r
moni.quest.61AD3760E271B431.description7: - &3Chemical Bath&r: &2uses Sodium Persulfate or Mercury to purify certain ores, granting a chance to yield a full pile of a byproduct.
moni.quest.61AD3760E271B431.description8: &r- &3Centrifuge&r: separates Pure or Impure dusts into the final material, with a chance for a full pile of byproduct.
moni.quest.61AD3760E271B431.description9: - &3Electrolyzer&r: uses power to split compounds into individual elements, sometimes gaining useful byproducts in the process. &2Be warned that certain dusts may be better to directly smelt instead of electrolyze!&r
moni.quest.61AD3760E271B431.title: &2Ore Processing for Byproducts
moni.quest.61CC4AD6FAE15248.description2: In this age, you'll create your first machines, including the multiblock &3Electric Blast Furnace&r, and learn the ropes of developing your Factory.
moni.quest.61CC4AD6FAE15248.title: &7LV&r Age
moni.quest.61E018C3BAB05818.description1: There's no rush to get these all done and leveled up, but they do provide a good source of some of the basic resources in exchange for RF.
moni.quest.61E018C3BAB05818.description2: Look at what the &6Prediction&r for each mob provides, and set up simulators for all the ones you're interested in. If your power can handle it, it can even be advantageous to run several of the same model.
moni.quest.61E018C3BAB05818.title: &2Overworld&r Mobs
moni.quest.61E5D7EEE745C6FB.description1: &bSophisticated Storage&r and &bSophisticated Backpacks&r are great options for storing items, both at your base and on the go, as well as offering a variety of both helpful and fun upgrades.
moni.quest.61E5D7EEE745C6FB.description2: &bSophisticated Storage&r in particular is great for cheap storage, able to store 3 barrels worth of items at it's lowest tier, costing only a bit of steel and invar to craft, and can be upgraded with barrel upgrades to hold even more items and upgrades.
moni.quest.61E5D7EEE745C6FB.subtitle: Bags of holding
moni.quest.61E5D7EEE745C6FB.title: &9Sophisticated Storage Shenanigans
moni.quest.61FA0AACDF4AC11D.description1: A &3Precision Laser Engraver&r is used to engrave circuits onto &6Wafers&r.
moni.quest.61FA0AACDF4AC11D.description2: The type of circuit will depend on the kind of wafer used and which &aLens&r is in the machine.
moni.quest.61FA0AACDF4AC11D.title: MV Precision Laser Engraver
moni.quest.6203088E30E34B45.description1: &9Nitrogen&r comprises 78%% of the atmosphere. Because of this, after the first few processes of &9Liquid Air&r, you'll probably have more Nitrogen than you know what to do with.
moni.quest.6203088E30E34B45.description2: If you got here centrifuging air, then it's gonna take you longer to get to that point.
moni.quest.6203088E30E34B45.description3: Even so, don't void it unless you have secured a very large stockpile. Storage is cheap and Nitrogen is used in sizeable quantities for several notable things, one of which you'll be needing very soon.
moni.quest.6203088E30E34B45.title: &2Nitrogen
moni.quest.62356B88D5366D33.description1: &6Certus Quartz&r can be grown from &6Budding Certus Quartz&r blocks!
moni.quest.62356B88D5366D33.description2: Check out the &9&lin-game guide&r&r or &eG&r on the item for specifics on how to get this set up.
moni.quest.62356B88D5366D33.description3: With enough power, you can even create your own &6Flawless Budding Certus Quartz&r, which works without ever decaying!
moni.quest.62356B88D5366D33.subtitle: Just like Amethyst
moni.quest.62356B88D5366D33.title: &9Crystal Growing
moni.quest.626330BB4A59E567.description1: Break up your &6Sand&r into &6Dust&r. Used for nothing, apart from &6Clay&r and &6Netherrack&r.
moni.quest.62BBD1F6767A4D90.description1: The &3Wiremill&r is a major efficiency boost, giving you double the amount of &6wires&r per ingot. But first, you'll need to make some &6Motors&r.
moni.quest.62BBD1F6767A4D90.description2: &bGregTech&r machines are built from a number of components, many of which are shared between the machines. Motors&r are used in a great number of things, including other components.
moni.quest.62BBD1F6767A4D90.description3: The Wiremill requires a &6Programmed Circuit&r to run. Each machine comes with a free one - click on the circuit slot in the &9bottom left&r of the GUI. For making single wires, leave the circuit at &econfiguration 1&r. Refer to &eEMI&r for which circuit config a recipe calls for, and refer to the adjacent quest for more information.
moni.quest.62BBD1F6767A4D90.description4: After you make the Wiremill, &econsider making a few stacks&r of LV motors. This might sound extreme, but &ebatch crafting&r in this manner is an important habit to pick up. This way you won't have to craft more for a while, and you &owill &ruse all those motors eventually, so you're not wasting materials.
moni.quest.62BBD1F6767A4D90.description5: As you get access to more machinery, you will no longer need to craft things manually. Instead, you will engineer factories to automate the production for you. It is useful to keep a stockpile of frequently used things like circuits and components crafted so you don't have to wait for them when you need them.
moni.quest.62BBD1F6767A4D90.description6: &2If the machine sounds start to get on your nerves, you can mute GT machines with a GT Hammer, &9or mute the sound entirely in the ESM menu, accessible from your inventory.
moni.quest.62BBD1F6767A4D90.subtitle: The factory begins
moni.quest.62BBD1F6767A4D90.title: &2Wiremill
moni.quest.62C85A1F451C4855.description1: Now that you've been to the Moon, consider going to &6Other Planets&r.
moni.quest.62C85A1F451C4855.description2: Each planet has abundant resources like the &eMoon&r and new, unique ores to boot. To get there, you need a &6Better Rocket&r.
moni.quest.62C85A1F451C4855.description3: With a &3Tier Two Rocket&r you can make it to &eMars&r. Mars has &6Scheelite&r, &6Arsenopyrite&r, &6Carnotite&r, &6Borax&r, and veins of liquid &9Fluorine&r.
moni.quest.62C85A1F451C4855.description4:
With a &3Tier Three Rocket&r you can make it to &eMercury&r and &eVenus&r. Before you go, make a &eNetherite Space Suit&r, otherwise the atmosphere will &cburn you to death&r.

Mercury has &6Argentite&r for &eIndium&r, &6Plutonium&r, and &6Laurite&r, as well as fluid veins of &9Blazing Pyrotheum&r, &9Sodium Persulfate&r, and... &9Mercury&r.
Venus has &6Xenotime&r, &6Gallite&r, &9Sulfuric Acid&r fluid veins, and lots of &6Platinum Group ores&r.
moni.quest.62C85A1F451C4855.description5: With a &3Tier Four Rocket&r you can make it to &eGlacio&r. Glacio has &6Naquadah&r, &6Kaemanite&r, &6Stolzite&r, &6Iridosmine&r, and &6Osmiridium&r, as well as &6Gelid Cryotheum&r fluid veins.
moni.quest.62C85A1F451C4855.title: &9...and Let Me Play Among the Stars
moni.quest.62C85A1F451C4855.subtitle: One must imagine Frank Sinatra happy.
moni.quest.62C8DB9874421C79.description1: The &3Sequential Fabricator&r is an alternative to the &bEnder IO&r &3Crafter&r and the &bExtendedCrafting&r &3Auto Crafting Table&r. It is the most intuitive of the three, and can handle bucket crafting using Fluids.
moni.quest.62C8DB9874421C79.subtitle: More reliable than a Crafter
moni.quest.631F5DFF43F7A289.description1: The &6Extended Molecular Assembler&r is able to perform &a8 crafts at a time&r, and does each of those crafts &atwice as fast&r, meaning this assembler can do some serious work. It however loses its ability to hold a pattern for passive crafting.
moni.quest.631F5DFF43F7A289.subtitle: More Parallel Crafting
moni.quest.631F5DFF43F7A289.title: &9Extended Assembling
moni.quest.634E056463ED1532.description2: This alloy is cooked in an &3Electric Blast Furnace&r and cooled in a &3Vacuum Freezer&r.
moni.quest.634E056463ED1532.title: Tungstensteel
moni.quest.63812416270292A4.description2:
This age will expect both &9Prismatic and Microversal mastery&r of you, and let you unlock the secrets of &9Infinite Power&r.
Project, shatter and corrupt dozens of Microverses, package circuit parts inside Microverse shards to craft the powerful &6Extradimensional Circuits&r, and craft highly unstable &6Supercritical Prismatic Cores&r allowing the production of &6Monium&r, a &3Post-Infinity Material&r.
moni.quest.63812416270292A4.title: &aUEV&r Age
moni.quest.646B8CD10787D899.description2: In this age, you begin sending microminer missions for &6Naquadah&r, which is then processed into the materials needed to construct the &3Fusion Reactor&r.
moni.quest.646B8CD10787D899.title: &dLuV&r Age
moni.quest.637953544CE66BDB.description1: Some of these simulations will start to consume tremendous amounts of power at this point, so if you're finding it a struggle, don't be afraid to hold off on progressing through these data models until a later time.
moni.quest.637953544CE66BDB.title: &8End&r Mobs
moni.quest.638130DC8A2BF1C1.description1: This is your first Microminer ever. You'll need &6Phosphorous&r in its &6LV Field Generator&r.
moni.quest.638130DC8A2BF1C1.description2: This Microminer is &6fully reusable&r, so you can send it on as many missions as you want.
moni.quest.638130DC8A2BF1C1.description3: To see what this Microminer can bring back, check its recipes in &bEMI&r.
moni.quest.638130DC8A2BF1C1.title: &2First Foray Into The Microverse
moni.quest.2BF1E9CC0D7F7C91.description1:
If you chose to cultivate &6Rubber Saplings&r, then you will receive &6Sticky Resin&r as a product. &3Centrifuging&r the &rRubber Logs&r you get will net you some extra, alongside &6Carbon Dust&r and &9Methane&r.

This substance is wonderfully versatile, especially in Early Game. You should definitely passively produce this.
moni.quest.63969C74693044BA.title: Element 006: Carbon
moni.quest.63ADD9B48834AA39.description1: This pack has &aSnad&r, which is simply a sand-like block that instantly grows sugar cane/cactus on top of it when it receives either a block update or a redstone update.
moni.quest.63ADD9B48834AA39.description2: The sugar cane it produces can be used as fuel for your dynamos, and later you can even brew &9Biomass&r with it.
moni.quest.63ADD9B48834AA39.description3: This quest calls for a &aRedstone Clock&r because it grows Snad even on the fastest setting - vanilla Observer clocks pulse too quickly.
moni.quest.63ADD9B48834AA39.description4: To harvest the sugar cane, you can use a piston and an observer.
moni.quest.63ADD9B48834AA39.description5: For now, a &3Vacuum Chest&r should help keep the floor clean, and will cause less lag than Hoppers. A &aVoid Upgrade&r in a &6Storage Drawer&r will automatically delete any items that overflow the drawer's capacity, so it's a good way to ensure you don't crash your server from accumulating a massive sugar cane pile.
moni.quest.63ADD9B48834AA39.subtitle: Yes, Snad.
moni.quest.63ADD9B48834AA39.title: Snad
moni.quest.63B27CA5BB60B740.description1: &bMV&r opens up chemistry and distillation, unlocking more efficient fuels.
moni.quest.63B27CA5BB60B740.rich_descrip: In particular, you should aim for oil distillates like
moni.quest.63CC578C3558E0AF.description1: The &3Hyperbolic Microverse Projector&r is the most powerful projector. It can perform all previous Microminer missions, as well as unlocking many new ones.
moni.quest.63CC578C3558E0AF.description2: It can accept a &6parallel hatch&r, allowing it to run most recipes in parallel. Certain recipes are unable to parallel, and are marked as such in &bEMI&r.
moni.quest.63CC578C3558E0AF.title: &9Hyperbolic Microverse Projector
moni.quest.6416118459258E42.title: Element 095: Americium
moni.quest.641B049C71B3EB34.title: Americium
moni.quest.641B049C71B3EB34.description1: &6Americium&r can be obtained through fusion in a &3Mk2 Fusion Reactor&r. Soon, you'll be able to use Naquadah Chemistry as an alternate source.
moni.quest.645B1DCB3DA7198A.description1: &6&6String&r and &6Coal Dust&r can be baked together into &6Carbon Fiber Mesh&r in an &3Alloy Smelter&r.
moni.quest.645B1DCB3DA7198A.description2: Combine that with &6Pulsating Dust&r to get &6Pulsating Mesh&r.
moni.quest.645B1DCB3DA7198A.title: Pulsating Mesh
moni.quest.648B1E09AA648798.description1: &2Sulfuric Acid is mainly produced in a 3-step process:&r
moni.quest.648B1E09AA648798.description2: -&6 Sulfur&o&r added to &9Oxygen&r to produce &9Sulfur Dioxide&r. &9SO₂&r also can come from treating certain &6Sulfur-containing Dusts&r with &9Oxygen&r in the EBF, or by processing &eNether Air&r.
moni.quest.648B1E09AA648798.description3: - &9Sulfur Dioxide&r added to more &9Oxygen&r, to produce &9Sulfur Trioxide&r.
moni.quest.648B1E09AA648798.description4: - &9Sulfur Trioxide&r added to &9Water&r, to produce &eSulfuric Acid&r.
moni.quest.648B1E09AA648798.description5: The shortcut Sulfur + Water reaction is locked behind the Large Chemical Reactor, unlocked at &6HV&r.
moni.quest.648B1E09AA648798.description6: You can also get Sulfuric Acid by adding &9Oxygen&r to &9Hydrogen Sulfide&r, which can be obtained via Petroleum, or by combining &9Hydrogen&r and &6Sulfur&r.
moni.quest.648B1E09AA648798.description7: &rYou'll need huge amounts of this for a whole range of chemical reactions, as it is a very common ingredient.
moni.quest.648B1E09AA648798.description8: Sulfur can be electrolyzed from many things.
moni.quest.648B1E09AA648798.title: &2Sulfuric Acid
moni.quest.64AAF0CD958D836A.description1: &2GT Fluid Pipes&r are quite powerful. Their advantage is high &9throughput&r and the ability to use &9GT covers&r, but they have limitations on the kinds of fluids (&eacids, gases&r, etc) they can transport safely. Check each pipe material's tooltip for details. Fluid pipes do require a pump to be able to pull fluids from tanks or machines that lack an auto-output function, but &2ULV pumps (as well as other covers) are very cheap, and buyable with Monicoins&r.

&2GT Fluid Pipes&r are quite powerful. Their advantage is high &9throughput&r and the ability to use &9GT covers&r, but they have limitations on the kinds of fluids (&eacids, gases&r, etc) they can transport safely. Check each pipe material's tooltip for details. Fluid pipes do require a pump to be able to pull fluids from tanks or machines that lack an auto-output function, but &2ULV pumps (as well as other covers) are very cheap to craft&r.
moni.quest.64AAF0CD958D836A.description2: There are also &6Quadruple and Nonuple Pipes&r for transporting multiple fluid types through the same block.
moni.quest.64AAF0CD958D836A.description3: You also have access to &9LaserIO&r, which allows for some extremely complex and compact filtering. LaserIO's nodes are wireless, have channels, can be overclocked, and allow for 9 cards per side.
moni.quest.64AAF0CD958D836A.title: &9GT Fluid Pipes
moni.quest.64B52DA2ABD5152D.description1: The &3Extruder&r is an alternative way to form shapes from metal. &aExtruder Shapes&r are used for telling an Extruder which shape to make.
moni.quest.64B52DA2ABD5152D.description2: Extruders are &2not strictly needed for any recipe, but often provide single-step or tool-free alternaives to other methods.&r Extruders use ingots, but are as efficient for making &6Gears&r as melting and solidifying. They are also the most efficient way to make &6Bolts&r, &6Small Gears&r, and &6Rings&r.
moni.quest.64B52DA2ABD5152D.description3: You can also use Extruders to make things from other machines like plates and wires, but they take more energy than using the dedicated machines for these purposes.
moni.quest.64B52DA2ABD5152D.description4: &2There is also an LV version, but most of the Extruder's recipes must be run at MV or higher.
moni.quest.64B52DA2ABD5152D.title: &2Extruder
moni.quest.64C33333ECCAABC7.description1: With some now-standard components you can upgrade a pair of &6Crystal Proessors&r into &6Crystal Processor Assemblies&r.
moni.quest.64C33333ECCAABC7.title: The Third Tier Six Circuits
moni.quest.64CD4BDBEBD0353D.title: Element 063: Europium
moni.quest.64F45D98FA48D834.description1: Combining &6Basic RF Capacitors&r with some &6Coal Dust&r and &6Energetic Alloy&r produces a &6Double-Layer RF Capacitor&r.
moni.quest.64F45D98FA48D834.description2: This is a tier two capacitor. Higher tier RF Capacitors will make &bEnder IO&r machines process faster and depending on the machine will expand their capabilities further (like area of effect).
moni.quest.664107ED03A944CD.description1: The Third Microminer. &2You'll need Boron in its MV Field Generators.&r
moni.quest.664107ED03A944CD.description2: Look in &bEMI to see what resources this miner can produce.
moni.quest.664107ED03A944CD.description3: At this point in the game, Microminers can get you most basic resources, continue to check &bEMI&r to see what they can give you.
moni.quest.664107ED03A944CD.title: &2Tier Three Microminer
moni.quest.6646E6DBEF368924.description1: &3Pattern P2P&r is somewhat like the other &aP2P&r types, but is able to copy a pattern provider's patterns to all of its outputs.
moni.quest.6646E6DBEF368924.description2: For example, you could have a Pattern P2P Input placed on a pattern provider, then 5 Outputs with the same ID placed on Assemblers. All 5 of those Assemblers would then &6act as if they each had their own pattern provider that all just so happened to have the same exact patterns&r, and will obey blocking rules, parallelize, and such.
moni.quest.6646E6DBEF368924.title: &9Pattern P2P
moni.quest.6648CD525CE34898.title: Element 008: Oxygen
moni.quest.66E1F1B28E4577B2.title: Inductors
moni.quest.66E1F1B28E4577B2.description1: &6Inductors&r, the successor of Small Coils, are another circuit component you will need. For the best results, use &6Nickel Zinc Ferrite&r and &6Annealed Copper&r to make these. But depending on which setups you build first, you may not need to make many of the basic version over the SMD version.
moni.quest.66FCC26399376B55.description1: This pack is intended to be played on &bPeaceful&r.
moni.quest.66FCC26399376B55.description2: You start off in &2The Overworld&r, a resource-rich wilderness dotted by clusters of urban buildings like the one you spawned in.
moni.quest.66FCC26399376B55.description3: If you wish to have a blank palette for building your base, place the &6Void World Cake&r down on the ground and eat a slice to be sent to the &7Void World&r.
moni.quest.66FCC26399376B55.description4: Simply place down and eat any dimensional cake for access to that dimension.
moni.quest.66FCC26399376B55.description5: If you're playing with friends, don't forget to invite them to an &eFTB Teams party&r.
moni.quest.66FCC26399376B55.description6: Beginner tips on &2Gregtech&r and &2Monifactory&r features will be higlighted in &2dark green&r.
moni.quest.66FCC26399376B55.description7: More advanced tips about &9Monifactory&r and other mod quirks will be higlighted in &9Blue&r.
moni.quest.66FCC26399376B55.description8: Notes about things in &5Beta&r will be higlighted in &5Dark Purple&r.
moni.quest.66FCC26399376B55.subtitle: Welcome to Monifactory
moni.quest.66FCC26399376B55.title: &9Genesis
moni.quest.670C69611ECFF5C8.description1: This compass will lead you to the nearest meteor impact. Use your favorite mining tools to smash through the &6Skystone&r shell and get to the juicy center where a &6Mysterious Cube&r with the plates are found.
moni.quest.670C69611ECFF5C8.description2: Please note that while they're often in a big crater, the meteors might be buried underground; when the compass is spinning wildly, you're right on top of one.
moni.quest.670C69611ECFF5C8.description3: &2If exploration isn't your thing, you can make the presses out of &6Vanadium Steel&2 in a &3MV Laser Engraver&2.
moni.quest.670C69611ECFF5C8.subtitle: &bApplied Energistics&r uses &aPresses&r found in cubes at the heart of meteors as templates for &3Inscribers&r to make &6inscribed circuits&r.
moni.quest.670C69611ECFF5C8.title: Meteorite Hunter
moni.quest.672D43BD113251EA.description1: The &3Assembly Line&r needs to be provided with &edata&r on how to craft items before it can craft them. Data on how to craft each item is stored in a &6Data Stick&r and read by a &aData Access Hatch&r. This data is required to craft &6LuV components&r and the &3Fusion Reactor&r, among other things.
moni.quest.672D43BD113251EA.description2: To begin, craft a &3Scanner&r and a few &6Data Sticks&r. The initial Scanner recipes run at &6HV&r, but &9IV&r is required relatively soon so might as well make that one.
moni.quest.672D43BD113251EA.description3: Press &8R&r on the item you want to craft in &bEMI&r and navigate to the &bScanner tab&r. This will tell you which item needs to be scanned to make the data for the new item. For example, &dLuV &6Electric Motors&r will require an &9IV&r &6Electric Motor&r to be scanned.
moni.quest.672D43BD113251EA.description4: Place a &6Data Stick&r with the item to be scanned in the &3Scanner&r. The item will be &cconsumed&r and its data will be written to the &6Data Stick&r. Each &6Data item&r can only hold a &csingle recipe&r.
moni.quest.672D43BD113251EA.description5: Finally, place the &6Data Stick&r into the &aData Access Hatch&r of your &3Assembly Line&r. It will now be able to craft that item.
moni.quest.672D43BD113251EA.description6: Later, you will need more advanced &6Data Orbs&r and &6Data Modules&r to store data, and a &3Data Bank&r to read them.
moni.quest.672D43BD113251EA.description7: If you need to create duplicate Data items, you can copy the data to a blank data item of the same type using the Scanner.
moni.quest.672D43BD113251EA.title: &9Assembly Line Data
moni.quest.67591B6025C03130.description1: As the name suggests, this catalyst is formed from exotic non-elemental materials and alloys.
moni.quest.67591B6025C03130.subtitle: A small appetizer, before the &9Omnium&r main course.
moni.quest.67663B49B80849C1.description1: &6Wetware Processor Supercomputers&r are made in an &3Assembly Line&r at &cZPM&r or higher power.
moni.quest.67663B49B80849C1.title: The Second Tier Eight Circuits
moni.quest.677D081CD7612FB0.description1: The Large Combustion Engine is much like an &5EV&r upgrade to an &6HV&r combustion Generator, but with a few differences.
moni.quest.677D081CD7612FB0.description2: First, it's a multiblock. This means it takes up more space, requires a &6Maintenance Hatch&r, and costs a significant amount of Titanium.
moni.quest.677D081CD7612FB0.description3: Second, it consumes &9Lubricant&r in addition to regular combustion fuels.
moni.quest.677D081CD7612FB0.description4: Third, it can be supercharged with &9Oxygen&r to produce &e3x&r more energy from &e2x&r more fuel.
moni.quest.677D081CD7612FB0.description6: In addition to being more efficient, both of these fuels have an additional use in smelting &6Cryolobus&r later on.
moni.quest.677D081CD7612FB0.rich_descrip: While you're at it, you should also look into switching to
moni.quest.67833AE5421E10D4.description1: &6Crystal CPUs&r are the cores of &6Crystal Circuits&r.
moni.quest.67833AE5421E10D4.description2: You'll need an &dLuV &3Laser Engraver&r to craft this.
moni.quest.67833AE5421E10D4.title: &2Crystal Processing Unit
moni.quest.6792DF5F9F320B98.description1: Turn your &6Glass&r into &6Quartz&r. An &3Arc Furnace&r making &6Glass&r supports 2.5 &3Electrolyzers&r of the same tier. You will need a lot of &6Quartz&r, so it's crucial that you passive this.
moni.quest.67C7895F2722D348.description1: &6&6Redstone&r, &6Sulfur&r, and &6Blaze Powder&r creates &6Pyrotheum Dust&r, a mixture imbued with potent elemental flame.
moni.quest.680C4363C268B223.description1: All unformatted Storage Cells are limited to at most 63 distinct item types, with the first item of each new type taking up a chunk of the total bytes of cell storage, and subsequent items of existing types taking a small number of bytes thereafter.
moni.quest.680C4363C268B223.description2: A &61k ME Storage Cell&r is the first and smallest cell for storing items. If you are going to be storing many different kinds of items in your network, you will need to make an &6ME Drive&r and fill it with multiple Storage Cells.
moni.quest.680C4363C268B223.description3: The &64k ME Storage Cell&r is the next size up. With four times the bytes it holds substantially more items per type, but it requires a more advanced technology: AE &6Processors&r made in an &3Inscriber&r.
moni.quest.680C4363C268B223.subtitle: &bApplied Energistics&r uses &6Storage Cells&r as its primary means of digital item and fluid storage.
moni.quest.680C4363C268B223.title: Digital Storage At Last
moni.quest.685330660E88E827.description1: It's a little difficult to produce energy using combustion in &7LV&r, but if you have easy access to a nearby &9Oil&r spout it may be beneficial to you; &6Combustion Generators&r can use both &9Raw Oil&r and &9Light Oil&r for power.
moni.quest.685330660E88E827.description2: However, burning &9Oil&r for power isn't very efficient. You'll want to distill the &9Oil&r if you want to make better use of the stuff.
moni.quest.68CB6AD16F1041E5.subtitle: unlocks nm and hm quests
moni.quest.68CB6AD16F1041E5.title: &eNot EM
moni.quest.68CE119F73B6FACF.title: Element 048: Cadmium
moni.quest.68E87B959F6E9216.description1: In the Steam age, &9Steam&r is used for power instead of &eEnergy Units&r.
moni.quest.68E87B959F6E9216.description2: You can generate it by burning solid fuel, burning liquid fuel, or by harnessing the power of the sun as long as you have the respective boiler.
moni.quest.68E87B959F6E9216.description3: All three boilers can be upgraded to High Pressure boilers upon gaining access to &6Steel&r, which more than doubles their &9Steam&r production.
moni.quest.68E87B959F6E9216.title: Steam Power
moni.quest.6974AA409CC355E6.description2: This enables you to produce all byproducts from &9Oil&r instead of just one.
moni.quest.6974AA409CC355E6.rich_descrip: At this point, you should consider producing
if your generators consume too much of your current fuel - they'll last longer than less sophisticated fuels.
moni.quest.69BFFF8BFB3B3B5C.description1: Crush your &6Glass&r into &6Glass Dust&r. Used for nothing, apart from &6Silicon Dioxide Dust&r.
moni.quest.69E77BD01CFF65EB.description1: It smelts items at a blazing quick &a5 ticks&r each. At this point, you might as well just make a &3Multi Smelter&r.
moni.quest.69E77BD01CFF65EB.title: Furnace v8.0
moni.quest.6A262AA410619C23.description1: Another common component of any machine that uses fluids. Also usable as a cover for moving fluids between &bGregTech&r machines and adjacent tanks or machines.
moni.quest.6A262AA410619C23.description2: These need &6Rubber Rings&r, which require a &aKnife&r to craft. A stick and a piece of flint will make a Knife with low durability, or you can check &bEMI&r for better ones.
moni.quest.6A262AA410619C23.title: LV Pumps
moni.quest.6A6983C64374366C.title: UHV Assembler
moni.quest.6A6983C64374366C.description1: You'll need &6Wetware Mainframes&r, &6Manyullyn&r, &6Neutronium&r, &6PEEK&r, &6Actinium&r, &6Darconite&r, and &6Terbium&r to make this Assembler.
moni.quest.6A6983C64374366C.description2: With this you can make &4UHV &6Energy Hatches&r, allowing you to make &6Omnic Matrix Coils&r and unlocking the most efficient recipe for &6Wetware Processors&r.
moni.quest.6A76B3DCA599B9B5.title: Hostile Microverses
moni.quest.6A76B3DCA599B9B5.description1: Micro miners that perform combat require a special microverse, a &3Hostile Microverse&r. To create one, declare war on a Normal microverse with a bomb strapped to a &6T2.5MM&r.
moni.quest.6A76B3DCA599B9B5.description2: A Hostile Microverse behaves very different from a Normal microverse. Hostile microverses cannot be repaired with &6Quantum Flux&r, and decay naturally even when no recipe is running. However, as your micro miner thins the hordes, stability is restored to the microverse.
moni.quest.6A76B3DCA599B9B5.description3: You will need to run missions periodically to prevent the collapse of the Hostile microverse, making it quite the challenge to automate. Consider using a &6Microverse Stability Sensor Hatch&r to help.
moni.quest.6A7A480FAC6103D2.description1: Open your inventory and look at the top-left corner of the screen. Click the map-looking icon called &eClaim Manager&r.
moni.quest.6A7A480FAC6103D2.description2: &6Click a chunk&r to claim it as yours. This will prevent unwanted creeper explosions and other players from interacting with your base.
moni.quest.6A7A480FAC6103D2.description3: &eIf you're playing on a server with custom settings, ask the server owner what methods are available&f.
moni.quest.6A7A480FAC6103D2.description4: To invite players to your &bFTB Utils&f party, look for a corresponding button in the same corner. Parties share claimed chunks with each other. You can configure permissions for your party's claimed chunks in the party settings menu.
moni.quest.6A7A480FAC6103D2.subtitle: You might be wondering what chunkloading options there are in the pack.
moni.quest.6A7A480FAC6103D2.title: Claim Your Chunks and Invite Teammates!
moni.quest.6A8764DDD3489EE8.description1: Waystones also &anaturally generate&r across the world, so nothing is stopping you from simply roaming around and stealing Waystones for your own needs.
moni.quest.6A8764DDD3489EE8.title: Exploration can pay off!
moni.quest.6A914B240E1A7BCB.description1: This alloy is made from &2mixing 2 Gold Dust, 1 Redstone, and 1 Glowstone Dust in a Mixer, creating Energetic Alloy Dust,&r and putting it in your new &3Electric Blast Furnace&r.
moni.quest.6A914B240E1A7BCB.description2: Throw &2the prepared dust into the input bus&r and in twenty seconds your &6Energetic Alloy Ingot&r will be in the output bus.
moni.quest.6A914B240E1A7BCB.description3: &2In EV, you can build an Alloy Blast Smelter which performs the recipe faster.
moni.quest.6ABD83B58FADD4DF.description1: With &6Cryococcus&r and a bit of &6Americium&r, you can now craft the next tier of energy core, the &6Abyssal Energy Core&r.
moni.quest.6ABD83B58FADD4DF.description2: This core is directly used in &6Universal Warp Cores&r and &6Hadal Warp Engines&r, but more importantly can be upgraded into a &6Hadal Energy Core&r.
moni.quest.6ABD83B58FADD4DF.title: &9Abyssal Energy Core
moni.quest.6ABF927014F8B79D.description1: Being able to fly is nice. This is the first jetpack that uses &bEnder IO&r materials.
moni.quest.6ABF927014F8B79D.description2: There's also a quest chain for &bThermal Expansion&r Jetpacks (starting with the &6Leadstone Jetpack&r). Eventually you'll need to make both, but not for a long time, so feel free to ignore at least one of these quest chains unless you &oreally&r like flying.
moni.quest.6B121BEFD852BC2D.description1: &3Gold Furnaces&f are yet another step up in speed, taking only &a40 ticks&f to smelt an item.
moni.quest.6B121BEFD852BC2D.title: Furnace v5.0
moni.quest.6BA0B1B3AB853F9A.subtitle: Make it quick!
moni.quest.6BA0B1B3AB853F9A.description1: &9Exoskeletons&r increase your movement speed, letting you get around your factory even quicker.
moni.quest.6BA0B1B3AB853F9A.title: &9Exoskeletons
moni.quest.6B4A50B6F9F835EF.description1: Cool down your &9Lava&r into &6Obsidian&r. You'll need a lot of this, so it's probably wise to use &3Rock Breakers&r once you hit &6HV&r, as they produce &6Obsidian&r without consuming anything.
moni.quest.6B80737C5E1359F7.description1: The &9Omni-breaker&r is a tool added by &bGTM Utils&r which can instantly break any block.
moni.quest.6B80737C5E1359F7.description2: When using the &9Omni-breaker&r you can right click to break one block at a time, or hold left click to continuously break blocks.
moni.quest.6B80737C5E1359F7.description3: The &9Omni-breaker&r &cdoes not&r automatically relocate blocks to the player, so it is advised to use some type of &6magnet&r to avoid losing blocks.
moni.quest.6B80737C5E1359F7.subtitle: om nom nom nom
moni.quest.6B80737C5E1359F7.title: Omni-breaker
moni.quest.6B908DECFA46C8E0.description1: The &3HV Circuit Assembling Machine&r unlocks &2the Microprocessor Mainframe. That's it.&r
moni.quest.6B908DECFA46C8E0.description2: It can also optionally overclock recipes up to 128 EU/t, gaining additional speed for relatively more power.
moni.quest.6B908DECFA46C8E0.title: &2HV Circuit Assembler
moni.quest.6BBACA979DF9BA30.title: debug: undo hm
moni.quest.6BE1CD77618EC6C7.description1: &2Thin Polyphenylene Sulfide Sheets are required for wrapping LuV+ cables.
moni.quest.6BE1CD77618EC6C7.title: &2Polyphenylene Sulfide
moni.quest.6BF4A76C5B84EEE9.description1: The &6Tier Nine Microminer&r doesn't unlock any new items, but instead grants alternate sources for some pre-existing materials.
moni.quest.6BF4A76C5B84EEE9.description2: This miner is a great source of &6Darmstadtium&r and &6Duranium&r. It is also a slightly slower but cheaper source of &6Neutronium&r compared to the &3Fusion Reactor MKIII&r.
moni.quest.6BF4A76C5B84EEE9.title: Tier Nine Microminer
moni.quest.6C028CD89745098E.description2: In this age, you'll gain access to &bApplied Energistics 2&r, make your first &6Silicon Wafers&r and expand your growing collection of machines.
moni.quest.6C028CD89745098E.title: &bMV&r Age
moni.quest.6C199A6CBC13A481.description1: To make &9Tritanium&r, you first need to make &9Duranium&r. This is done by fusing &9Liquid Gallium&r and &9Radon&r in a &3Fusion Reactor MK I&r or better.
moni.quest.6C199A6CBC13A481.description2: Once you have Duranium, you can fuse Tritanium in a &3Fusion Reactor MK II&r using the Duranium and &9Liquid Titanium&r.
moni.quest.6C199A6CBC13A481.description3: If you're having trouble figuring out the right item and fluid ratios for batching up these processes, consider plugging the relevant recipes into &aEMI&r.
moni.quest.6C199A6CBC13A481.title: &2Tritanium Ingot
moni.quest.6C8DE5DC18CDADF0.description1: &6Annealed Copper&r is made &2in an Arc Furnace&r by treating &6Copper&r with &9Oxygen&r. It has less power loss than regular Copper when used as a cable, and is also required for more advanced electronic components.
moni.quest.6C8DE5DC18CDADF0.title: Annealed Copper
moni.quest.6CE6674C20500023.description1: Nothing special about this tier either.
moni.quest.6CE6674C20500023.title: The Second Tier Six Circuits
moni.quest.6D03BB4A6A4BBA27.description1: The main purpose for this device is to turn &6Certus Quartz&r into &6Charged Certus Quartz&r.
moni.quest.6D03BB4A6A4BBA27.description2: This device can be powered with RF via energy cards or AE energy from a network via cables.
moni.quest.6D03BB4A6A4BBA27.description3: It accepts power from &9five&r sides. Which &9five&r sides? It's pretty easy to guess.
moni.quest.6D03BB4A6A4BBA27.description4: You can also easily automate charging by having hoppers input items from the top or sides, and pull items from the bottom.
moni.quest.6D03BB4A6A4BBA27.title: Charging Quartz
moni.quest.6D2CFBF365E052D5.description1: &6Level Emitters&r emit a redstone signal if there is above/below a certain amount of a selected item in the network that the Emitter is attached to. Not selecting an item will make the Emitter read the total amount of any item in the network
moni.quest.6D2CFBF365E052D5.description2: Theses are very useful for turning on/off machines using &6Machine Controllers&r.
moni.quest.6D434F3B0E720A5A.description1: Petrochemistry is the category of organic chemistry pertaining to petroleum, otherwise known as &9Oil&r.
moni.quest.6D434F3B0E720A5A.description2: &bGregTech&r's petrochemistry may seem daunting at first, given the sheer number of chemicals and processing options, but it's actually easier to get into than you think.
moni.quest.6D434F3B0E720A5A.description3: Oil is the starting point, and can be found in several variants which you can pump from finite natural wells in the Overworld, as well as coming renewably from &6Oilsands Ore&r and &6Soul Sand&r, and directly in liquid form from a &3Fluid Rig&r.
moni.quest.6D434F3B0E720A5A.description4: &2The Fluid Rig can also harvest Raw Oil, Heavy Oil, and Light Oil depending on your fluid vein. All 4 oils give different ratios when distilled, so the best oil for you depends on your circumstance.&r
moni.quest.6D434F3B0E720A5A.description5: Start off by distilling the Oil. This will result in &9Sulfuric Heavy Fuel&r, &9Sulfuric Light Fuel&r, &9Sulfuric Naphtha&r, and/or &9Sulfuric Gas&r.
moni.quest.6D434F3B0E720A5A.description6: These will all need to be hydrodesulfurized using &9Hydrogen&r in a &3Chemical Reactor&r, which produces the non-Sulfuric versions.
moni.quest.6D434F3B0E720A5A.description7: All of these products are useful, so figure out how you want to store the variety and large quantities of fluids.
moni.quest.6D434F3B0E720A5A.description8: The upcoming quests will guide you through the basics of petrochemistry. Once you've mastered that, feel free to explore further.
moni.quest.6D434F3B0E720A5A.title: Navigating Petrochem
moni.quest.6D70F91101D8CBB4.description1: &6&6Redstone&r, a &6Snowball&r, and &6Blizz Powder&r creates &6Cryotheum Dust&r, a mixture imbued with potent elemental frost.
moni.quest.6DAA25CA26AE05E9.description1: Now that you have some &6MV circuits&r, you can make a &6Factory Augment&r that lets you &2smelt multiple items at once&r with your furnaces!
moni.quest.6DAA25CA26AE05E9.subtitle: Multi smelter, sort of!
moni.quest.6DAA25CA26AE05E9.title: Factory Augment
moni.quest.6DAB13A7BDECE94E.description1: The &3Assembly Line&r is a large multiblock structure that crafts complex materials, similar to an &3Assembling Machine&r. These will be crucial going forward for making a variety of components and machinery.
moni.quest.6DAB13A7BDECE94E.description2: Make sure your power generation and circuit production are up to the challenge. &2None of the Assembly Line recipes require programmed circuits.&r
moni.quest.6DAB13A7BDECE94E.description3: This quest calls for an Assembly Line that's 10 units long, allowing for 9 inputs and one output. This is a large enough Assembly Line to make &6LuV components&r, but you'll need to expand to more inputs for later projects.
moni.quest.6DAB13A7BDECE94E.description4: The structure of the Assembly Line is a little stricter than other multiblocks:
moni.quest.6DAB13A7BDECE94E.description5: - The &aInput Buses&r can only be placed along the bottom, must all be &8ULV&r tier, and must face downwards. The &aOutput Bus&r must be placed at the very end of the row of Input Buses, and can be any tier.
moni.quest.6DAB13A7BDECE94E.description6: - &aFluid Hatches&r can only replace the &6Steel Casings&r along the bottom.
moni.quest.6DAB13A7BDECE94E.description7: - &aEnergy Hatches&r can only be placed within the top row of &6Steel Casings&r.
moni.quest.6DAB13A7BDECE94E.description8: - The &2Data Access Hatch&r must replace a &6Grate Casing&r on the same side as the Assembly Line controller block. Later, you can replace this with an &2Optical Data Reception Hatch&r. Refer to adjacent quests for how the Assembly Line data system works.
moni.quest.6DAB13A7BDECE94E.description9: If your recipe is not running, ensure you have the corresponding &edata&r for the recipe in a &2Data Access Hatch&r or connected &3Data Bank&r.
moni.quest.6DAB13A7BDECE94E.title: &2Assembly Line
moni.quest.6DBD1492197AC92D.description1: Each Tier 2.5 Mission requires several buckets of &6lava&r and &6a block&r corresponding to the type of mob drops it returns.
moni.quest.6DBD1492197AC92D.description2: This &9Microminer&r offers a way to easily get some basic &6Mob Drops&r.
moni.quest.6DBD1492197AC92D.description3: While this Microminer can return several different types of mob drops, it is the only miner that can retrieve &6 Blaze Rods, Blizz Cubes, Blitz Motes, and Basalz Shards&r.
moni.quest.6DBD1492197AC92D.title: &9Tier 2.5 Microminer
moni.quest.6DC635766CD40FFF.description1: &6RTM Alloy&r is the fourth coil material available, increasing your EBF's operating temperature to 4500K so it can process more advanced materials.
moni.quest.6DC635766CD40FFF.description2: With these coils, you can now smelt &6Tantalum Carbide&r, required for the &3Alloy Blast Smelter&r.
moni.quest.6DC635766CD40FFF.title: &9RTM Alloy Coil Blocks
moni.quest.6DEA5CE28A667453.title: &9Resonant Backpack
moni.quest.6E06505BC7636985.description1: Mainly used for decorational blocks. Still part of &eCobbleworks&r I guess.
moni.quest.6E27637A9C94A0AA.description2: In this age, you can start making Multiblock versions of most of your machines, delve into &aFission&r, and finish up the &3Platline&r.
moni.quest.6E27637A9C94A0AA.title: &9IV&r Age
moni.quest.6E27B9938B280291.description1: You can easily automate most &bGregTech&r machines with &aME Pattern Providers&r and processing &aPatterns&r early on by using the machines' auto-output feature.
moni.quest.6E27B9938B280291.description2: Use &9the Machine's GUI&r to relocate the output side of a machine where you want it to be, then press the "&3Auto Output&r" and "&3Allow Input From Output Side&r" buttons, and put an ME Pattern Provider on that side of the machine.
moni.quest.6E27B9938B280291.description3: You can also allow input from the output side by shift-right-clicking with a screwdriver on the output side via the machine grid.
moni.quest.6E27B9938B280291.description4: Right-click the machine and enable item auto-output (&6orange box&r in the bottom-left corner of the GUI).
moni.quest.6E27B9938B280291.description5: Now, stuff the &6ME Pattern Provider&r with processing patterns. The next time you order an item, the ME Pattern Provider will push ingredients into the machine, and the machine will push outputs back into the Pattern Provider once they're ready, completing the craft. No need to use nodes or import buses!
moni.quest.6E27B9938B280291.description6:
Furthermore, you can use &3Blocking Mode&r, which ensures that no items are in the inventory before placing the items in, which is a handy way to prevent conflicts. &2Even better, blocking mode ignores Programmable Circuits and Molds!&r
&2Please note that non-consumable items should stay in the machine, and not be included in the pattern made. Yes, this means you should make a separate machine for each non-consumable, at least until you get &3Large Machines&2.&r
moni.quest.6E5343E45E99CBAD.description1: &6Indium&r is a rare material requiring specialized bulk ore processing to acquire. It is useful for making &6Indium Gallium Phosphide&r (InGaP).
moni.quest.6E5343E45E99CBAD.description2: You will need to purify (with an &3Ore Washer&r or &3Chemical Bath&r) &6Galena&r and &6Sphalerite&r to get &6Purified&r crushed ore. These need to be placed together in a &3Chemical Reactor&r along with &9Sulfuric Acid&r, which will result in &9Indium Concentrate&r.
moni.quest.6E5343E45E99CBAD.description3: This in turn needs to be reacted with &6Aluminium&r in another Chemical Reactor, to create &2Small Piles of Indium Dust, Aluminium Sulfite and &9Lead-Zinc Solution&r. The latter two can be centrifuged into various useful materials, and the Indium piles can be combined into full dusts.
moni.quest.6E5343E45E99CBAD.description4: Later on, you can substitute &6Argentite&r for &6Galena&r or &6Sphalerite&r. &2Indium can also be obtained from the Naquadah processing chain in LuV.
moni.quest.6E5343E45E99CBAD.title: Indium
moni.quest.6EA130B04FDE6868.description1: &6Omnic Matrix Coils&r are the final coil type you will need. At &a12600K&r, they're capable of smelting every material and make your EBF look &4f&6a&eb&au&2l&3o&9u&ds&5.
moni.quest.6EA130B04FDE6868.description2: Now, you could make this before you get the Omnic Synthesizer, it's perfectly doable, but there's nothing that really needs it.
moni.quest.6EA130B04FDE6868.title: &9Omnic Matrix Coil
moni.quest.6F10BBD085BF7532.description1: Separate &6Silicon Dioxide Dust&r out from your &6Amethyst Dust&r. With enough Budding Amethyst this can rival the output of your &eCobbleworks&r.
moni.quest.6F11E32BA70CA38C.description1: Bits of a &6Blitz Mote&r. Using a &3Macerator&r doubles your yield.
moni.quest.6F11E32BA70CA38C.title: Blitz Powder
moni.quest.6F32A8739D8E792A.description1: Encode them in a &aPattern Encoding Terminal&r.
moni.quest.6F32A8739D8E792A.description2: Note that recipes encoded with Substitutions on will use existing equivalent items, but &ewill only automatically craft the exact item specified in the recipe.&r
moni.quest.6F32A8739D8E792A.description3: &2Don't encode recipes that use hand tools.&r Otherwise, you risk jamming your system due to durability or NBT mismatches.
moni.quest.6F32A8739D8E792A.description4: Use recipes that use machines instead!
moni.quest.6F32A8739D8E792A.subtitle: &aPatterns&r are used to encode a single crafting table or processing recipe for on-demand automation with &bApplied Energistics&r.
moni.quest.6F32A8739D8E792A.title: Autocrafting Patterns
moni.quest.6F5BB99060FF03AC.description1: At this point, if you are not already using multiple &3Assembly Lines&r to perform your Circuit recipes, you really should be.
moni.quest.6F5BB99060FF03AC.title: &9The Third Tier Eight Circuit
moni.quest.6F76D81C52F0E04C.title: Element 022: Titanium
moni.quest.6F9041F256F517A3.subtitle: No hypothetical aliens were harmed in the harvesting of this item.
moni.quest.6FB0357E12499B5F.description1: &2The Large Ore Drilling Plants mine ores from under them in a large radius. They require Drilling Fluid to operate.
moni.quest.6FB0357E12499B5F.description2: They automatically macerate the ores, yielding 3 times more crushed ore than a normal Macerator, plus the normal amount of byproduct.
moni.quest.6FB0357E12499B5F.title: &2Large Miner
moni.quest.6FB3E3D9CA0F4B30.description1: Going out in search of a &6Rubber Tree&f is a viable option for sure. However, if this isn't appealing, you can also &eshear leaves&f and make &6Plantballs&f out of them. Plantballs smelt into &6Slime&f, and Slime smelts into &6Sticky Resin&f.
moni.quest.6FB3E3D9CA0F4B30.description2: You'll want to transition to Rubber Trees at some point, though, since the &eratio of leaves to rubber is quite poor&f.
moni.quest.6FB3E3D9CA0F4B30.description3: Rubber can be hammered into sheets just like metals can be turned into plates. It's quite inefficient to do it this way, but such is the life of early game &bGregTech&f. At least rubber isn't particularly hard to come by.
moni.quest.6FB3E3D9CA0F4B30.title: Rubber Sheets
moni.quest.6FDF37EE046349F7.description1: The &6Numismatic Dynamo&r is the main source of power through the Mid Game of the pack.
moni.quest.6FDF37EE046349F7.description2: Paired with a self-sustaining &bHostile Neural Networks&r setup, this dynamo can burn through &6Diamonds&r to produce large amounts of &eRF power&r.
moni.quest.6FDF37EE046349F7.description3: Just like other &bThermal Expansion&r dynamos, the &6Numismatic Dynamo&r can be given &eAugments&r to produce more power.
moni.quest.6FDF37EE046349F7.description4: While they're terribly convenient, try to wean off of them before &9IV&r or &dLuV&r.
moni.quest.6FDF37EE046349F7.title: Numismatic Power
moni.quest.6FE459376BF7ABBA.description1: &9Hydrogen Sulfide&r is a byproduct of hydrodesulfurization. &2It also comes from distilling Liquid Nether Air.&r
moni.quest.6FE459376BF7ABBA.description2: A simple chemical reaction with &6Oxygen&r reprocesses it into the useful &9Sulfuric Acid&r, or it can be electrolyzed for recovering the &9Hydrogen&r.
moni.quest.6FE459376BF7ABBA.title: &2Hydrogen Sulfide
moni.quest.6FE99EDDC6223F2E.description1: &oSilicon Dioxide is an important part of a Processing Line. Visit the Processing Lines Tab to have more info, useful tips and a visual representation of how to passively automate this.&r
moni.quest.6FE99EDDC6223F2E.description2: Around this point, you will need large quantities of &6Hydrogen&r and &6Oxygen&r.
moni.quest.6FE99EDDC6223F2E.description3: The first way that comes to mind is electrolyzing &9Water&r, but that is slow.
moni.quest.6FE99EDDC6223F2E.description4: Instead, the best way of making early game &6Oxygen&r is &6Silicon Dioxide&r.
moni.quest.6FE99EDDC6223F2E.description5: &6Hydrogen&r is a bit trickier, but you can put &6Methane&r and &6Water&r together in a &3Chemical Reactor&r. &6Methane&r can be achieved by centrifuging &6Food&r and &6Wood&r, processing &6Pyrolyse Byproducts&r, or through &6Petroleum&r.
moni.quest.6FE99EDDC6223F2E.description6: Right now, for the small quantities you need, you can simply electrolyze &9Water&r. Just keep those other ways in mind, for later in the game.
moni.quest.6FE99EDDC6223F2E.title: Hydrogen and Oxygen
moni.quest.70026930847E8EC0.description1: &n&9Monifactory&r&r shares an official Discord server with Pansmith's various projects, which serves as a useful community resource.
moni.quest.70026930847E8EC0.description2: On the server, there are flowcharts and guides to help you with many parts of the pack accessable via the server's helpful bot, development announcements and more are available in the &n#announcements&r channel, and the community helps with tech support questions, and investigates possible bug reports.
On the server, development announcements and more are available in the &n#announcements&r channel, and the community helps with tech support questions, and investigates possible bug reports.
moni.quest.70026930847E8EC0.description3: You can also chat with many fellow players there if you like, who are largely willing to help with general questions one might have.
moni.quest.70026930847E8EC0.rich_descrip: To join the server, you can use the button on the Main Menu to go to the join URL, or if you're not into Discord you can find other projects from Pansmith, one of the modpack authors, on
Issue tracking and development is handled on the respective GitHub project repositories. The repository for this pack is
moni.quest.70026930847E8EC0.subtitle: what's a voltage? can I eat it?
moni.quest.70026930847E8EC0.title: Discord and GitHub
moni.quest.701E607E9A035299.title: All About Items!
moni.quest.7045BE273C44BA35.description1: The &3Aquatic Entangler&r is an alternative to the &bGregtech&r &3Fisher&r for producing &6Fish&r. You may find it to be useful later to produce &6Mincemeat&r en masse.
moni.quest.70784021A2D4E520.description1: &6Wrought Iron&r is a better alternative than &6Iron&r for tools, and with the &3Alloy Smelter&r you finally have a way to manufacture it, albeit slowly.
moni.quest.70784021A2D4E520.description2: First, you put Iron Ingots the &3Alloy Smelter&r with a &6Nugget Mold&r to create Iron Nuggets. Those Nuggets are then smelted in any &3Furnace&r to create &6Wrought Iron Nuggets.&r
moni.quest.70784021A2D4E520.description3: Finally, you can turn those &6Wrought Iron Nuggets&r into a &6Wrought Iron Ingot&r with another trip to the &3Alloy Smelter,&r or by &3Macerating&r them, combining the dust piles and another round of smelting in a &3Furnace.&r
moni.quest.70784021A2D4E520.description4: After all that hassle, though, you're probably better off using &6Steel.&r
moni.quest.70D9B3C6539720DE.description1: Now that you have &6HSS-G&r, you can begin automating &bExtended Crafting&r recipes in an easier way than before.
moni.quest.70D9B3C6539720DE.description2: To begin, you'll need to craft one of each extended &3Package Crafter&r listed above. Put an &3Unpackager&r on top of each one, and then a &3Packager&r anywhere you want. These are all AE2 devices, so you'll need to connect them to an ME Network.
moni.quest.70D9B3C6539720DE.description3: Next, right-click the &3Package Recipe Encoder&r, and you should see a button saying "Processing": this button cycles through recipe types, including the various Extended Crafting tables. You'll have to choose the appropriate table for the recipe you want to encode.
moni.quest.70D9B3C6539720DE.description4: &6Holders&r must be encoded in pairs: one for the Packager, and one for the Unpackager. Select the appropriate table for the recipe, look up the recipe you want to encode, and press &6[+]&r in &bEMI&r to fill it in. Put two Holders in the top-left slot and press Save to encode the recipe to both of them. Finally, put each Holder into the respective machines.
moni.quest.70D9B3C6539720DE.description5: If you've done everything correctly, you should see the item appear as craftable in a Terminal.
moni.quest.70D9B3C6539720DE.description6: While it the crafting process is &3significantly slower than using &6Auto Crafting Tables&r, &ePackagedAuto is able to easily parallelize&r. You can surround an Unpackager with Crafters and it will use all of them. It's also possible to add more Unpackagers with Crafters to keep up with the Packager, as long as the Holders are all the same.
moni.quest.70D9B3C6539720DE.description7: If this is too confusing, try out
moni.quest.70D9B3C6539720DE.title: &9Automating Extended Crafting
moni.quest.70E774D0394C0B8E.title: Element 080: Mercury
moni.quest.70FD95AEA44548B0.title: Advanced Soldering Alloy
moni.quest.70FD95AEA44548B0.description1: Like &6Soldering Alloy&r that comes before it, &6Advanced Soldering Alloy&r is used in the &3Assembler&r and &3Circuit Assembler&r to produce circuits and other electrical machinery.
moni.quest.70FD95AEA44548B0.description2: Unlike Soldering Alloy, however, Advanced Soldering Alloy is twice as efficient, so recipes that allow for it will only consume half as much when compared to regular Soldering Alloy, and one quarter as much compared to &6Liquid Tin&r.
moni.quest.712023557B5B1812.description1: It's probably a bit premature to consider a &6jetpack&r at this point, but if you really want to craft this bad boy, I won't stop you.
moni.quest.712023557B5B1812.description2: There's also a quest chain for &bEnder IO&r Jetpacks (starting with the &6Conductive Iron Jetpack&r). Eventually you'll need to make both, but not for a long time, so feel free to ignore at least one of these quest chains unless you &oreally&r like flying.
moni.quest.712023557B5B1812.subtitle: Being able to fly is pretty sick. It's also pretty expensive.
moni.quest.713FAECEE5046121.description1: The multiblock uses &6Energy Cores&r to release extremely large amounts of energy at once to craft things.
moni.quest.713FAECEE5046121.subtitle: What good is a battery if you don't use it?
moni.quest.713FAECEE5046121.title: &9Discharger
moni.quest.715BC5C7DAC53B7B.description1: A &3Simulation Chamber&r from &bHostile Neural Networks&r (&bHNN&r) allows you to farm mobs in a totally environmentally (and server) friendly way!
moni.quest.715BC5C7DAC53B7B.description2: Simulated mobs can even be used to provide you with many of the basic resources you'll need (such as &6iron&r, &6gold&r, &6tin&r, &6copper&r, &6diamonds&r and much more!), through pristine matter.
moni.quest.715BC5C7DAC53B7B.description3: Setting up &bHNN&r automation during the early game is &avery important&r as it gives you access to infinite quantities of many resources!
moni.quest.715BC5C7DAC53B7B.description4: &3Simulation Chambers&r are not sided, so you can input and output from any side.
moni.quest.715BC5C7DAC53B7B.description5: &9You no longer need to train &6data models&9, all &6data models&9 start out as Self Aware!
moni.quest.715BC5C7DAC53B7B.description6: Yes, you can also use it for generating power &ousing &6Diamonds&r.
moni.quest.715BC5C7DAC53B7B.title: &9Simulating Mobs
moni.quest.7174484A926682F3.description1: A colorless liquid with a pungent, garlic-like odor. It's needed in the production of &9Epoxy&r.
moni.quest.7174484A926682F3.description2: &2You can skip a step making this with the Large Chemical Reactor.
moni.quest.7174484A926682F3.title: &2Epichlorohydrin
moni.quest.718AF2C9476BE1F4.description1: A component used for more advanced items related to &bExtended Crafting&r.
moni.quest.71C7B47DC85AA016.description1: &9Phenol&r is produced as a byproduct from making &6Coal Coke&r in a &3Pyrolyse Oven&r.
moni.quest.71C7B47DC85AA016.description2: These boards will enable crafting the next tier of circuits.
moni.quest.72414246D5FBBFA9.title: Element 098: Californium
moni.quest.7256E0064F967C93.description1: &6Surface Mounted Devices&r, or &6SMD&rs for short, are &2more efficient ways to produce the Circuit components you've been making.&r
moni.quest.7256E0064F967C93.description2: All SMD components must be produced in at least a &2HV Assembling Machine&r, and they all will require liquid &9Polyethylene&r.
moni.quest.7256E0064F967C93.description3: Start off with the &6SMD Transistor&r. These are simply a &6Gallium &2Foil&r and &6Fine Annealed Copper Wire&r.
moni.quest.7256E0064F967C93.description4: Next up are &6SMD Resistors&r, which are also simple: &6Carbon Dust&r and &6Fine Electrum Wire&r.
moni.quest.7256E0064F967C93.description5: Next up are &6SMD Diodes&r, which are fairly simple. &2Gallium Arsenide Dust&r and &6Fine Platinum Wire&r net you half a stack.&r
moni.quest.7256E0064F967C93.description6: Then are &6SMD Capacitors&r. You'll need sheets of &6Polyvinyl Chloride&r to make these, or they can also be made more slowly with &6Silicone Rubber&r. &2Using Tantalum Foil in place of Aluminium doubles your yield.
moni.quest.7256E0064F967C93.description7: Finally, &6SMD Inductors&r. Made with &6Nickel Zinc Ferrite&r and &6Fine Cupronickel Wire.&r
moni.quest.7256E0064F967C93.description8: Invest in a robust system of automation for SMD components and all of their ingredients, since you'll need them in large quantities for several tiers to come. They will also work in place of the non-SMD versions you've been using in all but the simplest of recipes.
moni.quest.7256E0064F967C93.title: &2SMD Components
moni.quest.726528BE5A1A6AC2.description1: Prospectors show a display of the ores available in the chunks around you.
moni.quest.726528BE5A1A6AC2.description2: Mousing over a chunk shows the amount of each type of ore in that chunk, and the list to the right allows you to select specific ores within range.
moni.quest.726528BE5A1A6AC2.description3: If you &osomehow&r run out of charge on your prospector, simply submit it back in and we'll give you a fresh one!
moni.quest.726528BE5A1A6AC2.title: Recharge Your Prospector!
moni.quest.72861B317663600B.description1: Combine your &6Dust&r and some &6Water&r to make &6Clay&r.&r
moni.quest.72AFBEFCEAE86EC1.description1: Unformatted disks always have a hard limit of 63 distinct types of items, but each step up has roughly four times the total storage space of the prior disk.
moni.quest.72AFBEFCEAE86EC1.subtitle: A component used primarily for making bigger &6Storage Cells&r.
moni.quest.72AFBEFCEAE86EC1.title: 4k Item Storage
moni.quest.72D61AFACC53A34A.description1: &6Overworldian Matter&r and &6Netherrack&r can be crafted into &6Hellish Matter&r.
moni.quest.72D61AFACC53A34A.description2: Netherrack can be obtained by combining a &6Dust Block&r and &cLava&r in a &3Chemical Reactor&r.
moni.quest.72D61AFACC53A34A.title: &4Nether&r Matter
moni.quest.72FFB2AAB5EA049D.description1: &3World Accelerators&r accelerate the ticks of any non-GregTech machine adjacent to them.
moni.quest.72FFB2AAB5EA049D.description2: The &6HV&r WA accelerates by 8x, the &5EV&r WA accelerates by 16x, and the &9IV&r WA accelerates by 32x. They require an input of 8A of their voltage tier. Be sure to right-click the WA once with a &aScrewdriver&r to set it to &eTile Entity Mode&r, otherwise it will accelerate random ticks in a radius around it instead.
moni.quest.72FFB2AAB5EA049D.description3: Make them in an &3Assembly Line&r with some very advanced components.
moni.quest.72FFB2AAB5EA049D.title: Right Hand of Chronos
moni.quest.7308924C9A481443.description1: &2Unique to this Circuit theme, this MV circuit doesn't require the previous tier to craft.&r These are the best kind of Tier Two circuits you can make, and you won't unlock the better recipes for them until &9IV&r.
moni.quest.7308924C9A481443.description2: You should absolutely automate the production of these circuits, and &ekeep a stockpile automatically crafted&r so you don't have to wait around for them or bloat your crafting orders making them on-demand through AE.
moni.quest.7308924C9A481443.title: &2The Third And Final Tier Two Circuits
moni.quest.738A141D31AD7CE3.description1: &6Hadal Energy Cores&r are the ultimate tier of &6energy core&r, used for the most powerful and advanced items.
moni.quest.738A141D31AD7CE3.description2: These cores require &6Omnium&r and &6Neutronium&r and must be filled with &6Hadal Sculk&r.
moni.quest.738A141D31AD7CE3.description3: Hope you've got those &6Hadal Shards&r automated.
moni.quest.738A141D31AD7CE3.subtitle: The culmination of so much effort.
moni.quest.738A141D31AD7CE3.title: &9Hadal Energy Core
moni.quest.73908E06B75B9C9E.description1:
&l&4&nThis item's pattern multiplication and item replacement functions are currently unusable due to recent AE2-related updates. The team is investigating the issue.&r&r&r

Handling &6Patterns&r gets tedious pretty quickly, from not having enough slots to move tens of them at a time, to having to multiply them when upgrading your &3Large Machines&r, which, when equipped with &3Parallel Control Hatches&r, may require you to supply more than one item at a time to utilize them to their fullest.
moni.quest.73908E06B75B9C9E.description2: You don't want to supply one ingot and get two wires when your &3Large Wire Factory&r can take &e64 ingots&r and make &e128 wires&r at a time, right?
moni.quest.73908E06B75B9C9E.description3: That's where the the &6Pattern Modifier&r comes into play, which makes it possible to &emove, multiply, divide and clear patterns in bulk&r.
moni.quest.73908E06B75B9C9E.subtitle: &l&4&nThis item's pattern multiplication and item replacement functions are currently unusable.
moni.quest.73908E06B75B9C9E.title: &9Mastering Patterns
moni.quest.739F7BF2A90B278A.description1: Near the end of the ZPM tier you will have to start producing &6Omnium&r using the &3Omnic Synthesizer&r. You can use this chapter as a list of all the things that can be used to make omnium. Refer to the Synthesizer's quest for why this is important.
moni.quest.739F7BF2A90B278A.subtitle: Man, that's a LOT of quests linked to this one.
moni.quest.73A44214C2B44D53.description1: The &3Dimensional Superassembler&r uses dimensional warping to process hundreds of Assembly Line recipes at once.
moni.quest.73A44214C2B44D53.description2: Notably, the Dimensional Superassembler bypasses the need to use &6ULV Input Buses&r, so you are free to stuff the entirety of a recipe into a single input bus.
moni.quest.73A44214C2B44D53.title: &9Dimensional Superassembler
moni.quest.73C1AB31431B5C11.description2: &2In EV Age, you can build an Alloy Blast Smelter which performs the recipe faster.
moni.quest.73C6E2724EBEC997.description1: You can combine various items with a &6Model Framework&r for a completed &6Data Model&r that you can run inside the &3Simulation Chamber&r.
moni.quest.73C6E2724EBEC997.description2: In &9Monifactory&r, all &6data models&r start out at the Self Aware tier.
moni.quest.73C6E2724EBEC997.title: Simulated Mobs
moni.quest.73C713703AB6387C.description2: Each quest in the tab will give you a description of the machine and the minimum voltage required to run the recipe.
moni.quest.73C713703AB6387C.rich_descrip: Click to go to the chapter
was added to provide some examples on how to renewably produce useful resources through unconventional means. Use it wisely!
moni.quest.73C713703AB6387C.title: &2Renewable Production Tab
moni.quest.73F80C5062B86D09.title: Element 027: Cobalt
moni.quest.73F8EA8E7DCC94E9.description1: &3Circuit Assemblers&r are the linchpin of your factory, gating progression through the &6Circuits&r.
moni.quest.73F8EA8E7DCC94E9.description2: Each time you upgrade to a new voltage of Circuit Assembler, you will be able to craft more advanced &ethemes&r of circuits. These use more complex ingredients and require new infrastructure to be in place, but are more efficient to craft overall than the same tier of circuit from the prior theme.
moni.quest.73F8EA8E7DCC94E9.description3: &2The LV Circuit Assembler allows you to make Electronic Circuits far more easily.
moni.quest.73F8EA8E7DCC94E9.description4: The circuit progression is largely based on native GTm progression, with a few minor changes to reflect the progression of this pack better.&r Check out the &9Progression quest book tab&r to see the flow of circuit progression.
moni.quest.73F8EA8E7DCC94E9.subtitle: Pick-n-Place
moni.quest.73F8EA8E7DCC94E9.title: &2LV Circuit Assembler
moni.quest.74469710D910C19D.description1: &bPackagedAuto&r is an addon for &bApplied Energistics 2&r. Its main purpose in &5Monifactory&r is to offer an alternate way to automate &bExtended Crafting&r recipes, but you may come up with other fun uses for it as well.
moni.quest.74469710D910C19D.description2:
In older Minecraft versions, &eApplied Energistics 2&r &3Processing Patterns&r could only hold up to 9 item stacks, capped at 64 each. This restriction has long been lifted and makes PackagedAuto mostly obsolete, but it can still be useful in niche cases.

Each &6Package Recipe Holder&r can store up to &e20 different recipes&r. Holders must be encoded in the &3Package Recipe Encoder&r.
moni.quest.74469710D910C19D.description3: In the vast majority of situations you'll need two identically-encoded Holders, as the following machines work together.
moni.quest.74469710D910C19D.description4: The &3Packager&r is a machine that compresses ingredients for a specific recipe into a set of &6Recipe Packages&r. Each package in a set can hold up to 9 stacks of ingredient items. A simple recipe might consist of one package, but a complex recipe can have up to 9 packages in its set (for 81 total item stacks).
moni.quest.74469710D910C19D.description5: The &3Unpackager&r is a machine that extracts ingredient items from complete sets of Recipe Packages made in a Packager, ejecting the items into an adjacent inventory. It will only extract the items if &eall packages in a set are present&r.
moni.quest.74469710D910C19D.description6: When both a Packager and Unpackager are connected to an ME Network and have the same recipe, the resulting item will appear as craftable in your &aTerminal&r.
moni.quest.74469710D910C19D.description7:
&3Packager Extensions&r will act like a clone of an adjacent Packager - including access to patterns in its Package Recipe Holder - allowing you to craft recipe packages faster. Simply place the Packager Extensions around the Packager. Up to 26 extensions in a 3x3x3 cube around the Packager are supported.

&9Note that PackagedAuto is quite performance intensive. If your game or server is struggling to keep up, you might benefit from finding alternatives to PackagedAuto.&r
moni.quest.74469710D910C19D.title: PackagedAuto
moni.quest.7460F22545A4EFB2.description1: Great for automatically converting between Nuggets, Ingots, and Blocks of metals, or simply storing massive amounts of things. Also works with &9Monicoins&r.
moni.quest.7460F22545A4EFB2.description2: The appearance can be customized by crafting the drawer into a &aFramed Compacting Drawer&r and then using a &9Framing Template&r or your crafting grid.
moni.quest.7460F22545A4EFB2.title: &9Compacting Drawers
moni.quest.747A3DEA569CB6C9.description1: This is the flight of our lives.
moni.quest.747A3DEA569CB6C9.title: Endgame
moni.quest.749281AED88852C2.description1: Smelt your &6Sand&r into &6Glass&r. If you're using a &3Electric Furnace&r to smelt it, it's more efficient to use the upgraded &3Furnaces&r, such as &3Iron Furnaces&r, which you can fuel with &6Sugar Cane&r. However, using an &3Arc Furnace&r doubles your glass output. Later, once you unlock them, &3Multi Smelters&r will be the best for this.
moni.quest.74935A3553451178.description1: &aLV Batteries&r were very simple to make, but more effective forms of power storage will be more complex to build, so we'll need to lay the groundwork now.
moni.quest.74935A3553451178.description2: For the &6Antimony&r you'll need, smelt &6Stibnite Ore&r or process &6Tetrahedrite Ore&r and &6Realgar Ore&r.
moni.quest.74935A3553451178.title: Canner
moni.quest.74A7ABF43D6A403F.description1: &9Sneak-right-click a Multiblock controller with a terminal to have it automatically pull blocks from your inventory to build the multiblock.
moni.quest.74A7ABF43D6A403F.title: &9Terminal
moni.quest.74B5CA5A48CE7B39.description1: You'll need &6Obsidian&r to make &6Dark Steel&r. Most of the tools you can make cannot mine Obsidian, but you do have a few potential options for ones that will work. The options you're most likely to have access to at this point are:
moni.quest.74B5CA5A48CE7B39.description4: Later, you can use a &3Rock Breaker&r at voltage &aHV&r or higher to make &6Obsidian&r without spending &6Lava&r!
moni.quest.74EDAE84246C7228.description1: &9Diesel&r is a mixture of &9Light Fuel&r and &9Heavy Fuel&r.
moni.quest.74EDAE84246C7228.description2: The primary use is for making &2Cetane-Boosted Diesel&r, which you will want to stockpile in large quantities for the later production of &6Cryolobus&r. &2Alternatively, &6Gasoline&2 can be used for that purpose, and later be upgraded into &6High Octane Gasoline&2 and &6JEAN Gasoline&r.
moni.quest.74EDAE84246C7228.description3: The performance of Combustion Generators is also improved, but you probably want to refine Diesel anyway.
moni.quest.74EDAE84246C7228.description4: &2While it is more power efficient to use singleblock Distilleries over a Distillation Tower for Oil, due to the overclocking mechanics being different. However, it is still recommended to use Distillation Towers, to get the other useful byproducts too. For Diesel, the correct ratio is 3 Distilleries for Light Oil and 2 Distilleries for Heavy Oil.
moni.quest.74EDAE84246C7228.title: Diesel
moni.quest.74FEF82CA2FB3D02.description1: &6Black Steel&r will be used to make various items from &bExtended Crafting&r. It will also be the basis of other Steel types later on.
moni.quest.74FEF82CA2FB3D02.title: Black Steel
moni.quest.754C416FB3F5DBDA.description1: &aMolds&r are used in a &3Fluid Solidifier&r or &3Alloy Smelter&r to form materials into specific shapes. These are not consumed or damaged during crafting, so you can leave them in a machine to dedicate it to that shape.

&aMolds&r are used in a &3Fluid Solidifier&r or &3Alloy Smelter&r to form materials into specific shapes. These are not consumed or damaged during crafting, so you can leave them in a machine to dedicate it to that shape.
moni.quest.754C416FB3F5DBDA.description2: Once in LV, the Fluid Solidifier tends to be the more efficient option: for example, you can use &e8 ingots&r to make one &6Gear&r in an Alloy Smelter, but with an Extractor and Solidifier you can accomplish the same result with &e4 ingots&r.

Once in LV, the Fluid Solidifier tends to be the more efficient option: for example, you can use &e8 ingots&r to make one &6Gear&r in an Alloy Smelter, but with an Extractor and Solidifier you can accomplish the same result with &e4 ingots&r.
moni.quest.754C416FB3F5DBDA.description3: Be careful not to accidentally make &aExtruder Shapes&r. Those are for a machine you will get access to later. The three molds in this quest are ones you will find useful right away.
Be careful not to accidentally make &aExtruder Shapes&r. Those are for a machine you will get access to later. The three molds in this quest are ones you will find useful right away.
moni.quest.75810A27FBBBFB77.description1: With &6Tritanium Coils&r, you now have the ability to make &6Raw Naquadah Solution&r and therefore &6Activated Naquadah Isotope Blend&r, the starting product of Naquadah Chemistry.
moni.quest.75810A27FBBBFB77.description2: The process consists of repeatedly distilling and cracking fluids. Cracking is done in &3Fusion Reactors&r, with 4 options of cracking material. Pick whichever one your base can handle best.
moni.quest.75810A27FBBBFB77.description3: Naquadah Chemistry yields large amounts of a variety of valuable resources. It will serve as your primary source of radioactive elements such as &6Neptunium&r, &6Curium&r, and &6Berkelium&r, as well as providing quite a bit of other advanced materials such as &6Tritanium&r, &6Darmstadtium&r, and &6Neutronium&r.
moni.quest.75810A27FBBBFB77.description4: The midproducts of Naquadah Chemistry also have use in the making of Liquid &6Naquadah Fuels&r, made in the &3Naquadah Refinery&r. They can function as your primary power source for the rest of the pack, &6Antimatter Fuel&r being the other option.
moni.quest.75810A27FBBBFB77.title: Naquadah Chemistry
moni.quest.75DD12FBC8AA39FC.description1: The &3Network Switch&r combines any number of &3Computation Data Reception Hatches&r into any number of &3Computation Data Transmission Hatches&r. This will be required when the &dCWU/t&r requirements of your &3Research Station&r exceed what a single &3HPCA&r can provide.
moni.quest.75DD12FBC8AA39FC.description2: Connect the &3Computation Data Reception Hatches&r&r to your &3HPCAs&r with &3Bridge Components&r within them, and connect a single &3Computation Data Transmission Hatch&r to your &3Research Station&r, and it will receive the sum of &dCWU/t&r from all of your HPCAs!
moni.quest.75DD12FBC8AA39FC.description3: Now, all* &3Assembly Line&r recipes are available to you, given you have the &dCWU/t&r to research them. The most computationally demanding recipe needed to beat the pack, the &6Extradimensional Processor Mainframe&r, requires &d192 CWU/t&r.
moni.quest.75DD12FBC8AA39FC.description4: The Network Switch consumes &d7,680 EU/t&r per &3Computation Hatch&r in its structure.
moni.quest.75DD12FBC8AA39FC.title: &2Network Switch
moni.quest.7641AE777370BE1A.description1: With tier three circuits in hand, it's time to make a &3Distillation Tower&r, which gates petrochemistry and more advanced plastics like &6Epoxy&r.
moni.quest.7641AE777370BE1A.description2: The Distillation Tower is a highly flexible multiblock structure, able to be anywhere from &62 blocks high to 13 high&r (12 fluid outputs).
