The way that it works is that each level of the tower after the first will output an additional fluid from the recipe. &cIf the number of fluid outputs from the recipe exceeds the number of available hatches or those hatches are too small to hold the output, the recipe will not run&r.
moni.quest.7641AE777370BE1A.description3: What you need the Distillation Tower for initially is to break down &9Oil&r and &9Fermented Biomass&r into useful resources.&9 Oil&r distillation, with its four outputs, will require a &efive-block-high Distillation Tower&r (the quest materials are for such a tower; if you want to build it bigger, you will need &ean additional 7 casings and 1 fluid output per floor&r).
moni.quest.7641AE777370BE1A.description4: Any recipe with more than four output fluids (like &9Fermented Biomass&r) will need a larger tower. Make sure to increase the height of your tower to accommodate all of the outputs you want to keep. Also check the voltage requirements of the recipes, as many Distillation Tower recipes need higher voltages than MV. &eYou can swap out your Energy Input for a higher tier one when that time comes&r. Also, any recipe that has an item output will need an &6Output Bus&r, anywhere on the bottom layer.
moni.quest.7641AE777370BE1A.description5: The tower we'll be building at first is 3x3x5 (LxWxH), with a hollow center. The &6Fluid Input Hatch&r and &6Maintenance Hatch&r &2can go anywhere on the bottom layer&r. The &6controller&r goes in the middle of an outer edge of the bottom layer. The &6Energy Input Hatch&r can go wherever you can fit it on the bottom layer. The rest of the 3x3 must be filled with &6Clean Stainless Steel Casings&r.&2 Each level above that is a ring of 7 Clean Stainless Steel Casings, one &6Fluid Output&r and nothing in the center, except for the topmost layer which needs an eighth casing to fill in the center, capping off the top.
moni.quest.7641AE777370BE1A.description6: For distilling fluids which only have one useful output, like &9Biomass&r, it is recommended to use single-block Distilleries, due to their energy efficiency and generally lower costs.
moni.quest.7641AE777370BE1A.title: &2Distillation Tower
moni.quest.76B813A1717561B5.title: Element 030: Zinc
moni.quest.76BAC72CC89F390E.description1: With &6&2Rhodium Plated Lumium-Palladium&r,&6 Niobium-Titanium&r, &2and Polyphenylene Sulfide&r, you can now make hulls for Ludicrous Voltage (LuV) &bGregTech&r machines.
moni.quest.76BAC72CC89F390E.title: &2LuV Machine Hulls
moni.quest.7704A934F89E4FD9.description1: The first circuits to need &6Hyperdynamic RAM&r. You may need to ramp up &6Heart of A Universe&r production to produce all of the Universe-imbued Silicon!
moni.quest.7704A934F89E4FD9.title: &9The Third Tier Nine Circuit
moni.quest.77582C534A994D7C.description1: This table allows you to craft 7x7 Extended Crafting Table recipes.
moni.quest.77582C534A994D7C.description2: &9Don't forget that you can automate Extended Crafting recipes before you get PackagedAuto by converting your Extended Crafting tables into autocrafting tables.
moni.quest.77582C534A994D7C.title: &9Elite Crafting Table
moni.quest.776199B37A19A592.description1: &2In GTm, higher-tier blends of dusts require higher-tier Mixers to mix. The MV Mixer is required for making Vanadium Steel and Stainless Steel.
moni.quest.776199B37A19A592.description2: There will not be more mixer quests after this one. Remember this when making higher-tier dust blends.
moni.quest.776199B37A19A592.title: &2MV Mixer
moni.quest.77670BF761084AA2.description1: A "&esubstrate&f" is the "board" part of a circuit board — the backing that the circuit components and wires are laid into. A good substrate needs to not conduct electricity, for obvious reasons. &6Wood&r coated in &6Sticky Resin&r is a primitive but effective material to use as your first substrate.
moni.quest.77670BF761084AA2.description2: You'll also need to make &6Vacuum Tubes&f, as well as some primitive &6Resistors&r. &6Paper&r will work as a material for these, for now.
moni.quest.77670BF761084AA2.title: &2Electronics Subcomponents
moni.quest.77880E592DB38C9C.title: Element ???: Trinium
moni.quest.77CEA89E47BB3B7A.description1: &9Air&r can be sent into the &3Vacuum Freezer&r to turn it into &9Liquid Air&r.
moni.quest.77CEA89E47BB3B7A.description2: &9Liquid Air&r can be sent into a &2Distillation Tower&r to break it down into its components.
moni.quest.77CEA89E47BB3B7A.description3: &2Liquid Nether Air and Liquid Ender Air give different useful components too.
moni.quest.77CEA89E47BB3B7A.title: &2Distilling Liquid Air
moni.quest.780706A4C4AEB9CE.description1: The &aAuxiliary Reaction Chamber&r is an augment that will work in all types of dynamos. It will consume fuel faster to produce a correspondingly higher RF per tick.
moni.quest.780706A4C4AEB9CE.description2: Each augment increases both base power production and fuel consumption by 100%%, additively (so the second is 200%%, third is 300%%, etc.).
moni.quest.780706A4C4AEB9CE.description3: Consider the tradeoffs however, as you could just make another dynamo, and you miss out on &aMulti-cycle Injectors&r augments that make fuels burn longer for more total RF generated. The Auxiliary Reaction Chamber will also put additional stress on your fuel production infrastructure.
moni.quest.780706A4C4AEB9CE.description4: If that's an acceptable tradeoff, then Auxiliary Reaction Chambers are a cheap and effective way to boost your power production.
moni.quest.780706A4C4AEB9CE.title: Auxiliary Reaction Chambers
moni.quest.7842EC1C389C4B7E.description1: The first tier of &6capacitors&r. These (or stronger versions) are required to make &bEnder IO&r machines run. They're also used as components in a variety of recipes.
moni.quest.7842EC1C389C4B7E.description2: Higher tier capacitors will significantly increase the speed at which these machines operate, among other machine-specific properties.
moni.quest.7842EC1C389C4B7E.title: Basic Capacitors
moni.quest.785300684B1846B2.description1: The &2MV Assembling Machine&r allows you to craft &6Medium Voltage Coils&r, and your &3Laser Engraver&r can make &2Ultra Low Power ICs with a Sapphire Lens.&r
moni.quest.785300684B1846B2.description2: Combine them with some MV parts and you can finally craft an &6MV Energy Hatch&r.
moni.quest.785300684B1846B2.description3: Higher tiers of energy hatch will require similar resources.
moni.quest.785300684B1846B2.description4: Note: For extracting energy from GT multiblock generators, you will need &6Dynamo Hatches&r instead. Those are crafted similarly to Energy Hatches, but with &6Springs&r in place of 1x Cables.
moni.quest.785300684B1846B2.title: &2MV Energy Hatches
moni.quest.785C6332FC7A07A5.description1: With &6Titanium&r smelting automated, you can now build Machine Hulls for Extreme Voltage machines.
moni.quest.785C6332FC7A07A5.description2: EV motors require a better material than &6Steel&r for its magnetism.
moni.quest.785C6332FC7A07A5.description3: &6Neodymium&r is required, which is mainly achieved from &6Rare Earth&r. The main sources of this are &6Redstone&r, and everything inside of &6Bastnasite&r veins.
moni.quest.785C6332FC7A07A5.description4: &2Starting at EV, 4A and 16A Energy and Dynamo hatches are available at each tier.
moni.quest.785C6332FC7A07A5.title: &2EV Machine Hulls
moni.quest.7865CDE5CFE005DC.description1: &3Iron Furnaces&f can smelt an item in &a160 ticks&f, which is somewhat faster than a vanilla &6Furnace&f, which takes &a200 ticks&f. The fuel efficiency remains the same for all furnaces.
moni.quest.7865CDE5CFE005DC.title: Furnace v2.0
moni.quest.786AECA42F53B45A.description1: &9Eltz&r is made by processing &6Impure Eltic&r gems or dust in a Electric Blast Furnace, which in turn are created from &6Eltic Sludge Dust&r via an in-world crystallization process.
moni.quest.786AECA42F53B45A.description2: Unfortunately, &6Eltic Sludge Dust&r is made through a long process which consumes large quantities of aluminosilicate dusts and &6Hydrofluoric Acid&r to make enough &6Dirty Hexafluorosilicic Solution&r.
moni.quest.786AECA42F53B45A.description3: Hopefully, you've stockpiled a ton of these dusts since they don't have much use otherwise. &eIf not, you can get more by centrifuging some types of rock dusts or mining the corresponding ores.&r
moni.quest.786AECA42F53B45A.subtitle: EZ, right?
moni.quest.786AECA42F53B45A.title: &9Eltz
moni.quest.78DCEF2FF2E1AC8C.description1: You'll need an &3HV Chemical Reactor&r for processing &6Titanium&r.
moni.quest.78DCEF2FF2E1AC8C.title: HV Chemical Reactor
moni.quest.78EB8574A67B10D4.description1: You will need either &9Seed Oil&r or &9Fish Oil&r in the process of making &9Bio Diesel&r, created by extracting seeds or fish.
moni.quest.78EB8574A67B10D4.description2: The easiest ways to get seeds are with a &9Greenhouse&r.
moni.quest.78EB8574A67B10D4.description3: The easiest way to get fish is through using a &aGregtech Fisher&r. If you are playing Normal Mode, a &aGuardian Model&r from &bHNN&r is also an option.
moni.quest.78EB8574A67B10D4.description4: Both are viable, so it's ultimately up to you.
moni.quest.78EB8574A67B10D4.title: &9Bio Diesel Feedstock
moni.quest.790E3275E88265E3.description1: &6Hellish Matter&r and &6Ender Pearl&r can be crafted into Extraterrestrial Matter.
moni.quest.7976402E2E5FD625.description1: To upgrade power production in &bGregTech&r, you can either make better generators, or make more of them. The &6Advanced Steam Turbine Generator&r consumes 4x as much &9Steam&r, but in exchange produces 4x as much &eEU&r.
moni.quest.7978CD633112BE89.title: Element 53: Iodine
moni.quest.7979D07FBDC6D170.description1: The final processing unit. Capable of storing and interacting with miniaturized microverses.
moni.quest.7979D07FBDC6D170.title: &9Extradimensional Processing Unit
moni.quest.797D6787F2BEE54C.title: Element 003: Lithium
moni.quest.798284BA30D818DA.description1: &6Drilling Kits&r are required to send &9Microminers&r on a variety of missions. These are cheap, so make sure you &9always keep a stock of them&r.
moni.quest.798284BA30D818DA.description2: Higher tier Microminers will use higher tiers of &6Drilling Kits&r, so get used to making them.
moni.quest.798284BA30D818DA.title: Drilling Kits
moni.quest.798889BE3819EB4D.description1: Made by adding some Cobalt, Manganese and Silicon to your HSS-G.
moni.quest.798889BE3819EB4D.title: High Speed Steel Type E
moni.quest.79EFCD8E01384C0C.description1: To make &6Tritanium&r, you first need to make &6Duranium&r. This is done by fusing &6Liquid Gallium&r and &6Radon&r in a &3Fusion Reactor MK I&r or better.
moni.quest.79EFCD8E01384C0C.description2: Once you have Duranium, you can fuse Tritanium in a &3Fusion Reactor MK II&r using the Duranium and &6Liquid Titanium&r.
moni.quest.79EFCD8E01384C0C.description3: If you're having trouble figuring out the right item and fluid ratios for batching up these processes, consider plugging the relevant recipes into &bEMI&r.
moni.quest.79EFCD8E01384C0C.title: &2Tritanium Ingot
moni.quest.7A09229ACC000B09.description2: It might seem crazy right now, but you'll want a dedicated &3Chemical Reactor&r for a large fraction of the chemicals you want to process. You probably want to hold off on doing that until you've got a solid base with autocrafting though… it stings a lot less when you can just request crafts of Chemical Reactors from your AE2 system.
moni.quest.7A09229ACC000B09.title: MV Chemical Reactor
moni.quest.7A12743F5ECCED90.description1: One of the more intricate components, as it is made using a motor.
moni.quest.7A12743F5ECCED90.subtitle: A piston is a specialized motor which is needed to make certain machines.
moni.quest.7A12743F5ECCED90.title: LV Pistons
moni.quest.7A3F3FB2774A4632.description1: Crush your &6Clay&r to make &6Clay Dust&r.&r Turns into many useful resources.
moni.quest.7A65459E4DFAAC2D.description1: &6Trinium&r is the seventh coil material available, increasing your EBF's operating temperature to 9001K so it can process more advanced materials.
moni.quest.7A65459E4DFAAC2D.title: &2Trinium Coils
moni.quest.7A67E519745A8361.description1: Once you have obtained your first piece of &6Hellish Matter&r, or unlocked the &3Atomic Reconstructor&r, travel to the &eNether&r becomes available.
moni.quest.7A67E519745A8361.description2: The &eNether&r contains quite a few useful resources:
moni.quest.7A67E519745A8361.description6: - &2Nether Air&r, which can be distilled for useful gases
moni.quest.7A67E519745A8361.description8: Despite all this, &eNether&r travel is still strictly optional in the pack, although it is recommended.
moni.quest.7A7907EE1F3FCFBF.description1: &2With LV power, you can only get Aluminium Dust from electrolyzing Clay Dust, Sapphire Dust or Green Sapphire Dust. Clay Dust is recommended. Once you make an MV Electrolyzer, you can get it from a plethora of other raw resources.&r
moni.quest.7AA5FD63FA3BA43C.description1: &6Circuit Wafers&r are batches of integrated circuits engraved onto a wafer of electronics-grade silicon.
moni.quest.7AA5FD63FA3BA43C.description2: You need to run these through the &3Cutting Machine&r to dice the wafers into individual integrated circuits (called dies).
moni.quest.7AA5FD63FA3BA43C.description3: These are important components and will be used for making more advanced Circuits.
moni.quest.7AA5FD63FA3BA43C.title: Circuit Wafers
moni.quest.7ACF867DECE1C37F.title: Projecting Microverses
moni.quest.7ACF867DECE1C37F.description1: Now that you have your &3Microverse Projector&r, you will need to project a microverse for the &6microminers&r to use. This is done using &6Universe Creation Data&r and quite a bit of &6Quantum Flux&r.
moni.quest.7ACF867DECE1C37F.description2: Looking at the Creation Data's uses in &bEMI&r, you'll see that it changes the microverse type to Normal. For quite a while, all microminers will require the Normal microverse type to run.
moni.quest.7ACF867DECE1C37F.description3: After projecting your microverse, the inside of the projector will change appearance, and you should be ready to send off your first microverse mission.
moni.quest.7AF06CB391779388.description1: These RAM chips will find use in various remaining circuit recipes.
moni.quest.7B1D349ADD9D1140.title: Ironman 2
moni.quest.7B73FD81B7E8FFFE.title: Element 074: Tungsten
moni.quest.7B8621728BF88BEC.title: Element 090: Thorium
moni.quest.7C0A37EEA3C63B16.description1:
Combining an &aI/O Bus&r and an &aME Interface&r into a single block, these can be used in place of &aInput&r and &aOutput Buses&r in GregTech multiblocks to connect them directly to your AE2 network.
&9As a side note, ME Busses and their Stocking variant don't support ME part priority. While this isn't usually an issue, you might want to use regular &6ME Interfaces&9 if you need to configure priorities.&r
moni.quest.7C0A37EEA3C63B16.description2: Note that only the uniquely-textured side will connect to an ME network.
moni.quest.7C0A37EEA3C63B16.title: &2ME Multiblock Buses
moni.quest.7C22CDB22492916F.description1: Taking a look at the &6Corrupted Universe Data&r has given you a couple of ideas, but to properly take advantage of it, a new Microminer is needed.
moni.quest.7C22CDB22492916F.description2: This Microminer requires an Epic Extended Crafting Table to fit all the things required for a foray into a corrupted universe.
moni.quest.7C22CDB22492916F.title: &9Tier Eleven Microminer
moni.quest.7C3B69B3DC09FE96.description1: The &aHang Glider&f is a great way to cross long distances, if you're so inclined.
moni.quest.7C3B69B3DC09FE96.description2: If you don't want to go exploring for Cows, just buy a pair of "&6Spawn Cow&f" eggs and breed them. Seriously, spend your &9coins&f!
moni.quest.7C3B69B3DC09FE96.title: Glider
moni.quest.7C55E6EBB28BF5C2.title: Element 033: Arsenic
moni.quest.7C5CE283172CD952.title: Ender Fluid Link
moni.quest.7C5CE283172CD952.subtitle: All out of spaghetti?
moni.quest.7C5CE283172CD952.description1: The &6Ender Fluid Link&r is a cover that you can place on the sides of machines.
moni.quest.7C5CE283172CD952.description2: When interacted with, it opens a GUI that allows you to specify which channel it will interact with, either pushing or pulling fluids from all other links on the same frequency.
moni.quest.7C5CE283172CD952.description3: Frequencies are distinguished based on a 8 character hexadecimal color code. Optionally, you can give each frequency a description. In the top left of the link's GUI, you can find a button leading to a menu with a list of all available frequencies and their descriptions.
moni.quest.7C5CE283172CD952.description4: There are a limited number of available frequencies, so try to keep the number of fluid links below 16,777,216.
moni.quest.7C6E64B63F0DB4BD.title: Element 050: Tin
moni.quest.7C89BC235C988689.description1: &6Bathyal Energy Cores&r are your first proper &6Energy Cores&r.
moni.quest.7C89BC235C988689.description2: Just like all future energy cores, they will need to be filled with sculk and then charged.
moni.quest.7C89BC235C988689.description3: It is recommended to use the &3Energetic Infuser&r from &bThermal Series&r to charge the cores. With the proper &6integral components&r and &6augments&r, the Infuser can operate at incredible speeds.
moni.quest.7C89BC235C988689.title: &9Bathyal Energy Core
moni.quest.7C9C91EC9F3930C2.description1: This is the largest Extended Crafting Table, capable of handling 11x11 recipes.
moni.quest.7C9C91EC9F3930C2.subtitle: Because 9x9 was clearly not enough.
moni.quest.7C9C91EC9F3930C2.title: &9Epic Crafting Table
moni.quest.7CFC483280B08A26.description1: Turn your &6Iron Ingots&r into &6Wrought Iron Ingots&r with the &9Oxygen&r from the &6Silicon Dioxide Dust&r. While there are other ways to get &6Wrought Iron&r, this is the fastest option in Early Game.
moni.quest.7D0351942F4DB8E0.description1: &6Capacitors&r are devices that store electrical energy, which is useful for circuits. Not to be confused with &bEnder IO&r's capacitors&r, which store redstone flux.
moni.quest.7D0351942F4DB8E0.title: Capacitors
moni.quest.7D29C79DE1CCA2A2.description1: This baby can do just about any fusion recipe, notably giving you an alternative method of obtaining &6Neutronium&r.
moni.quest.7D29C79DE1CCA2A2.description2: The multiblock layout is the same as the MK I and MK II, with the same hatch and casing substitutions permitted.
moni.quest.7D29C79DE1CCA2A2.description3: Obviously though, this one uses &6Fusion Machine Casing MK &2III&r and only works with &aUV Energy Hatches&r.
moni.quest.7D29C79DE1CCA2A2.description4: The &3MK III Fusion Reactor&r has an energy buffer of &e640M EU&r.
moni.quest.7D29C79DE1CCA2A2.subtitle: FUSION!
moni.quest.7D29C79DE1CCA2A2.title: &2Fusion Reactor MK III
moni.quest.7D3FAEA5E0071BDC.description1: Better substrates. Using &6Polyvinyl Chloride&r (PVC) instead of &6Polyethylene&r (PE) doubles your yield.
moni.quest.7D3FAEA5E0071BDC.description2: The &2other three material options&r are much more difficult to make and probably not worth considering for now.
moni.quest.7D3FAEA5E0071BDC.title: &2Plastic Substrate
moni.quest.7D4B29BA4D8CB153.title: Growing Sculk
moni.quest.7D4B29BA4D8CB153.subtitle: Locally sourced
moni.quest.7D622F83549C2387.description1: Craft any block with 4 &6Cable Anchors&r to get 4 &6Facades&r of that block. Facades can be placed on any type of ME cable. Cables can pass through facades.
moni.quest.7D622F83549C2387.title: Cable Facades
moni.quest.7D4B29BA4D8CB153.description1: While it is possible to obtain all your sculk from pillaging nearby Deep Darks or using microminers, the demand for these items will only grow, so it is recommended to switch to using a &3Sculk Vat&r soon for all of your sculk needs.
moni.quest.7D72B3FF808CE13C.description1: The &6Large Gas Turbine&r is a big upgrade to &6Advanced Gas Turbine Generator II&rs, providing &e8x&r as much power for &e8x&r the fuel consumption.
moni.quest.7D72B3FF808CE13C.description2: This can be further increased by upgrading the &6Rotor Holder&r, which multiplicatively stacks another &e2x&r per tier.
moni.quest.7DACCCE935194E39.description1: &6Boron&r is currently obtainable by doing ore processing on &6Lepidolite Ore&r and &6Salt Ore&r (via &6Borax&r).
moni.quest.7DB174443D7FAFA0.description1: A complex material from &bThermal Expansion&r cooked in an &3Electric Blast Furnace&r, or an &2Alloy Blast Smelter&r.
moni.quest.7DB174443D7FAFA0.description2: &6Enderium&r needs a lot of heat and is quite slow without overclocking. &2You can use small amounts of Krypton from Liquid Ender Air distillation to significantly decrease the smelting time.&r
moni.quest.7DB174443D7FAFA0.description3: &9Enderium also requires Tantalum, which can be renewably created by macerating and processing &6Dragon Scales&9.&r
moni.quest.7DB174443D7FAFA0.description4: As with all later blast furnace materials, it might be worth dedicating a furnace to keeping these in stock and having it running constantly to ensure a stable supply (turning it off when you have an acceptably vast stockpile).
moni.quest.7DB174443D7FAFA0.description5: In addition to its other uses, Enderium gets you access to &aResonant Integral Components&r for machines. These quests can be found on the &eProgression&r tab.
moni.quest.7DB174443D7FAFA0.title: &9Enderium
moni.quest.7DB1C08EEF0BEE02.title: Element 026: Iron
moni.quest.7DC209D400BCD708.description1: This little setup is used to unlock quests specific to certain modes, such as HNN chain.
moni.quest.7DC209D400BCD708.subtitle: uh oh
moni.quest.7DC209D400BCD708.title: &l&cREAD ME!!
moni.quest.7DE2C9292A09FC76.description1: The Moon is a barren, lifeless rock… why did you want to come here?
moni.quest.7DE2C9292A09FC76.description2: One major draw is that &6Moon Turf&r, which makes up the surface of the Moon, is an efficient means of obtaining &9Deuterium&r. It will be useful for producing &9Microversium&r, &9Tritium&r, plasmas from fusion, and crystallizing &6Dilithium&r.
moni.quest.7DE2C9292A09FC76.description3: The Moon also contains fluid deposits of &eDeuterium&r and &eHelium-3&r, which you can harvest with a &3Fluid Rig&r. However, you will want to use the second Fluid Rig tier to extract it, as the amount of Deuterium and Helium-3 is too low to be anything appreciable from a first tier Fluid Rig.
moni.quest.7DE2C9292A09FC76.description4: Space exploration isn't mandatory in this pack, so if you don't feel like exploring space with &bAd Astra&r, then you can centrifuge &9Hydrogen&r for &eDeuterium&r instead.
moni.quest.7DE2C9292A09FC76.description5: Just keep in mind that it's much less rewarding to skip this and you'll need lots of Hydrogen to compensate, although you won't need too much for the first &3Microverse Projector&r.
moni.quest.7DE2C9292A09FC76.description6: In &6HV&r Age and more effectively in &9IV&r Age, you can also get this from processing &9Ender Air&r, which may be better than going to the moon, depending on your circumstances.&r
moni.quest.7DE2C9292A09FC76.description7: There are also several ores that are rare on the Overworld but exist in abundance on the Moon. In particular, the Moon contains large quantities of &6Titanium&r, (in the form of &6Aluminium Ore&r and &6Ilmenite Ore&r) &6Chromium&r, (in the form of &6Chromite Ore&r) and &6Fluorine&r (in the form of &6Fluorite Ore&r).
moni.quest.7DE2C9292A09FC76.title: &2Deuterium
moni.quest.7E09D4E00BFA4970.description1: This is the first Tier Four circuit, which is used for EV-tier machinery. Requires some Vibrant Alloy.
moni.quest.7E09D4E00BFA4970.description2: &2The HV Circuit Assembler only unlocks one circuit type, the Microprocessor Mainframe. There is no circuit theme associated with the HV Circuit Assembler; instead, the HV (non-Circuit) Assembler unlocks easier Circuit components. The next circuit theme is not until EV.
moni.quest.7E09D4E00BFA4970.title: &2The First Tier Four Circuits
moni.quest.7E276DF48E9085A4.description1: Just like last time, the &6Advanced Gas Turbine Generator II&r is equivalent to 4 turbines of the previous tier.
moni.quest.7E276DF48E9085A4.description2: If you didn't choose a better fuel then, You'll definitely need one now. &9Nitrobenzene&r is far and away the best option, being the most efficient fuel available for &3Gas Turbines&r.
moni.quest.7E3A179376673590.description1: The &3Elite Microverse Projector&r is an even more powerful projector required for sending &6Tier Seven&r through &6Tier Ten Microminers&r into microverses.
moni.quest.7E3A179376673590.description2: With your third tier projector, you are now able to get up to two perfect overclocks on microverse recipes.
moni.quest.7E51D15F38C3B356.description2: These boards are required for &6Crystal Circuits&r, as well as the future basis of &6Wetware Circuit Boards&r. These will get you from tier five to tier eight.
moni.quest.7E51D15F38C3B356.title: Multi-Layer Fiber-Reinforced Printed Circuit Board
moni.quest.7E59E0E33962D787.description1: Normally, this block acts as a source of &echannels&r, but that mechanic is disabled by default in &5Monifactory&r.
moni.quest.7E59E0E33962D787.description2: You don't have to make this to operate a network when channels are disabled, but if you do, &eyour network will consume less power&r than if it did not have a Controller. Plus, they look kind of cool.
moni.quest.7E59E0E33962D787.subtitle: The &aME Controller&r acts as the 'brain' and a bit of power storage for an &eME Network&r.
moni.quest.7E59E0E33962D787.title: ME Controller
moni.quest.7E93D88827F83E1A.description1: The precursor to &6Dimensional Processing Units&r. On top of requiring &6Infinity Plates&r and &6The Ultimate Material&r, these need a lot of &6Polyethyl Cyanoacrylate&r. Make sure you can produce enough to feed the demand.
moni.quest.7E93D88827F83E1A.title: &9Dimensional Circuit Board
moni.quest.7EA737163230F984.description1: A &aSoft Mallet&f can be used to temporarily stop a machine from functioning. While &9this can also be done by pressing the pause button within the machine's GUI&r, the Soft Mallet allows you to quickly turn machines on and off without entering their GUI. &2In either case, please note that the machine will only stop after it finishes its current recipe.&r if you &6sneak-right click&r it. This can be helpful if you are low on power, but is mostly useful when you need to upgrade a multiblock (more on those later).
moni.quest.7EA737163230F984.description2: Although you can make it out of &6Wood&r, it is probably better to make it out of &6Rubber&r now that you can.
moni.quest.7EA737163230F984.subtitle: Bonk!
moni.quest.7EA737163230F984.title: &9Soft Mallet
moni.quest.7ECA688A91A1392A.description1: The &6Advanced System-on-Chip&r (or &6ASoC&r) unlocks the most efficient recipe for &6Nano&r and &6Quantum Processors&r.
moni.quest.7ECA688A91A1392A.description2: The latter of which must be made in a &cZPM &3Circuit Assembler&r.
moni.quest.7ECA688A91A1392A.title: Advanced System-on-Chip
moni.quest.7EE334D3AA1E68ED.title: Hyperdegenerate Darconite
moni.quest.7EE334D3AA1E68ED.description1: &6Hyperdegenerate Darconite&r is the one and only &aUEV&r superconductor. It's made by coating &6Darconite&r wires, fine wires, or foils in &6Hyperdegenerate Matter&r.
moni.quest.7F165C2BCCCBA565.description1: Mix &6Stone Dust&r, &6Clay Dust&r and some &9Water&r to make &6Concrete&r. This is probably the easiest way to get &6Concrete&r. You'll need this for &6Plascrete&r, used in &2Cleanrooms&r, and a tiny amount for &6Launch Pads&r.&o
moni.quest.7F165C2BCCCBA565.title: Concrete
moni.quest.7F1EE712BD9CC811.description1: &2Used in building the Alloy Blast Smelter.
moni.quest.7F1EE712BD9CC811.description2: &r&6Tantalum&r is best sourced in bulk from &6Dragon Scale&r processing, but can be obtained early on from &6Tantalite Ore&r, or in small quantities from centrifuging &eLava&r.
moni.quest.7F1EE712BD9CC811.description3: &6Molybdenum&r is obtained from &6Molybdenum, Molybdenite, Powellite, and Wulfenite ores&r. They spawn together in the &eNether&r rarely, or some of them come from &3Tier One&r and &3Five Microminers&r.
moni.quest.7F1EE712BD9CC811.description4: &2Remember, you need an appropriately tiered Mixer (HV for HSLA Steel, and EV for the others).
moni.quest.7F1EE712BD9CC811.title: &2Advanced Alloys
moni.quest.7F34A1A10CD8E058.title: debug: undo nm
moni.quest.7F669657313F2E62.description1: Cryolobus is a complex material needed in vast quantities.
moni.quest.7F669657313F2E62.description2: You can create it by mixing &6Sculk Dust&r with either &6Blue&r or &6Red Steel Dust&r, or by directly smelting &6Warden Tendrils&r.
moni.quest.7F669657313F2E62.title: &9Cryolobus Dust
moni.quest.7F75D961B102A72D.description1: Interestingly enough, &eSculk itself functions great as a biobattery&r, being able to store and quickly release mass amounts of energy. The &3Sculk Charger&r should be able to get you started in taking advantage of it.
moni.quest.7F75D961B102A72D.description3: Every &3Sculk Charger&r comes with three recipe slots in the top-right corner. To configure a recipe, the crafting grid must be filled with the recipe you wish to automate, and then saved to the table by &8Shift-Left-Clicking&r one of those recipe slots.
moni.quest.7F75D961B102A72D.description4: Saved recipes must then be selected with a &8Left-Click&r to indicate that that recipe should be crafted. Only one recipe can be selected at a time.
moni.quest.7F75D961B102A72D.description5: Lastly, place a regular &6Barrel&r atop the table. &eThe &3Sculk Charger&e cannot be inserted to, and can only pull items from an inventory&r.
moni.quest.7F75D961B102A72D.description6: At this point you can put ingredients in the inventory and supply &aRF&r power to &eboth the &3Sculk Charger&e and a &3Sculk Pylon&e nearby&r to begin automated charging.
moni.quest.7F75D961B102A72D.description7: The charger and pylon themselves have extreme energy throughput, so &ethe &3Sculk Charger&e can charge up to one &6Sculk Core&e per tick.&r
moni.quest.7F75D961B102A72D.rich_descrip: It is automated in a similar fashion to
moni.quest.7F75D961B102A72D.title: &9Sculk Charging
moni.quest.7FA0E6F3B466576C.description1: Although most &ealloys&f require an &3Alloy Smelter&f, some alloys can be made simply by mixing the correct metal dusts together.
Use your newly acquired &3Alloy Smelter&r to make some new alloys!
Use your newly acquired &3Alloy Smelter&r to make some new alloys!
moni.quest.7FA0E6F3B466576C.description2: Copper Dust mixed with Redstone makes &6Red Alloy Dust&f.
moni.quest.7FA0E6F3B466576C.description3: Iron Dust mixed with Redstone makes &6Conductive Iron Dust&f.
moni.quest.7FA0E6F3B466576C.description4: &3Smelt&f it into ingots, &ahammer&f it into &6Plates&f, and &acut&f them into &6Wires&f.
moni.quest.7FA0E6F3B466576C.title: From Dust to Wires
moni.quest.7FA6B36DCE648C66.title: Hadal Sculk
moni.quest.7FA6B36DCE648C66.description1: Combine &6Hadal Shards&r with various chemicals and a sample of Sculk to create an empowered variant of Sculk that will be used to fill &6Hadal Energy Cores&r and make &6Sculk Bioalloy&r.
moni.quest.7FA6B36DCE648C66.description2: The &6Sculk Agar&r used in the &6Sculk Petri Dish&r will require &6Americium Plasma&r from a &3Mk3 Fusion Reactor&r.
moni.quest.7FAB6FD0A054443E.subtitle: It continues to beat, even after removal from its host.
moni.quest.7FAB6FD0A054443E.title: &9Warden Hearts
moni.quest.7FC4297F2BC90F55.description1: If you like exploring, you can find them in meteors with a &aMeteor Compass&r.
moni.quest.7FC4297F2BC90F55.description2: If you don't want to do that, or are having trouble finding a meteor, feel free to etch them yourself with a &3Laser Engraver&r.
moni.quest.7FC4297F2BC90F55.subtitle: &aPresses&r are needed for &3Inscribers&r.
moni.quest.7FC4297F2BC90F55.title: Inscription Plates
moni.quest.3E45F67F09B6156B.description1: The &3Prismatic Crucible&r is a highly unique multiblock. A Crucible is always in one state of color at a time: Red, Orange, Yellow, Lime, Green, Teal, Cyan, Azure, Blue, Indigo, Magenta, or Pink. When the Crucible is first formed, it defaults to the Red state.
moni.quest.3E45F67F09B6156B.description2: Most Crucible recipes have a required initial color that the Crucible must be in for the recipe to run, and a Resulting Color that the Crucible will turn into once the recipe finishes. This information can be found in &bEMI&r. Some recipes 'increment' the Crucible's color, meaning the color moves that many spaces clockwise on the color wheel (see next page).
moni.quest.3E45F67F09B6156B.description3: Additionally, there are two recipe modes the Crucible can be in: Chromatic Processing and Chromatic Transcendence. Just like how the Multi Smelter can be in either Furnace or Alloy Smelter mode, the Crucible can only be in one mode at a time. The Crucible works the exact same in both modes, the only difference is what recipes are available.
moni.quest.3E45F67F09B6156B.description4: To save you a bit of time looking thorugh some of the many Crucible recipes in &bEMI&r, we have created the following diagrams.
moni.quest.3E45F67F09B6156B.description5: All of these images are available in higher resolution in
moni.quest.3E45F67F09B6156B.description6: &lThe 12 Prismatic Core recipes - Normal Mode&r (Chromatic Transcendence)
moni.quest.3E45F67F09B6156B.description7: Note that a prismatic core of color Magenta refers to an Active Prismatic Core, and White refers to Supercritical.
moni.quest.3E45F67F09B6156B.description9: &lThe 12 Prismatic Core recipes - Hard/Expert Mode&r (Chromatic Transcendence)
moni.quest.3E45F67F09B6156B.description1: Note that two arrows leading away from the same point indicates a random chance to go either direction. Good luck!

&lPhotonic SoCs&r

It is easier to explain how Photonic SoCs (PSoCs) work in text rather than visually.

Imagine each PSoC has three on/off levers for the Red, Green, and Blue colors. When a PSoC is put into the Crucible, the lever(s) corresponding to the Crucible's colors are toggled. Secondary colors flip both of their primary components' levers.

For example, a Red PSoC put into a green Crucible would output a Yellow PSoC, because the green color flipped the green 'lever' on.
A magenta PSoC put into a cyan Crucible would output a Yellow PSoC, because the cyan color toggled both the blue lever Off and the green lever On.

In either case, the Crucible will be left in the state corresponding to the PSoC's color &3at recipe start&r, or to the next primary color clockwise if the PSoC was inert.
moni.quest.3E45F67F09B6156B.subtitle: Taste the rainbow!
moni.quest.3E45F67F09B6156B.title: The Prismatic Crucible
moni.quest.11D0058859BD6F88.title: NanoMuscle™ Suit
moni.quest.11D0058859BD6F88.subtitle: Electrified Clothing!
moni.quest.11D0058859BD6F88.description1: The &6NanoMuscle™ Suit&r is the best armor set you have avaliable right now, even in peaceful mode the armor has it's uses, mainly in the fact it nullifies fall damage, useful for when building in high places.
moni.quest.11D0058859BD6F88.description2: &eFor anyone not playing in peaceful, &6NanoMuscle™ Suit&e has the same armor points, when fully charged, as &6Netherite Armor&e, but it also has a higher armor toughness, having 5 per piece instead of 3 per piece.
moni.quest.7BBDF8E5DD082310.title: Taking Flight
moni.quest.7BBDF8E5DD082310.subtitle: Not FAA approved by the way.
moni.quest.7BBDF8E5DD082310.description: The &6Advanced NanoMuscle™ Suit Chestplate&r gives the &6NanoMuscle™ Suit Chestplate&r a jetpack.
moni.quest.044EBE36128FBB01.title: QuarkTech™ Armor
moni.quest.044EBE36128FBB01.subtitle: With great power comes great responsibility, and cost.
moni.quest.044EBE36128FBB01.description1: For Peaceful lovers, the &6QuarkTech™ Armor Set&r nullifies burning, freezing, drowning and other harmful effects, and can be used as a &6Netherite Space Suit&r.
moni.quest.044EBE36128FBB01.description2: For people not playing on peaceful, the suit has more armor points than &6Netherite Armor&r when fully charged. The suit will also feed you food from your inventory when you're hungry
moni.quest.cobblestone.description:
The best source of &6Cobblestone&r early on is &eThermal &3Igneous Extruders&r. If the first one isn't enough, you can always upgrade and make more of them.&r This is the starting point of your &eCobbleworks&r.

Also a cheap building block.
moni.quest.0D3E0D645F80835D.title: Unstoppable
moni.quest.0D3E0D645F80835D.subtitle: King of the skies!
moni.quest.0D3E0D645F80835D.description: Strapping &62 Gravitational Engine Units&r and some more batteries to your back allows you to fly very very fast, reach new heights, and become closer to a god.
moni.quest.lava.description: &9Lava&r can be obtained in two main ways. The first is using a &3Chemical Reactor&r to turn &6Magma Blocks&r into &9Lava&r. The second is using a &bGregTech &6Fluid Drill&r in the Nether above a &9Lava&r vein.
moni.quest.motenothing.description1: This element is not in Monifactory.
moni.quest.motenothing.title: Nothing
moni.quest.sio2_o2.description: Split your &6Silicon Dioxide Dust&r into &6Silicon Dust and Oxygen&r. &6Silicon Dioxide&r electrolysis is the best source of Early Game &6Oxygen&r, although distilling &6Liquid Air&r may be better later, depending on your situation.
moni.quest.sio2_o2.title: Silicon and Oxygen
moni.quest.water.description:
There are many ways to procure &9Water&r, but the most notable are: &3Water Collectors&r, which are very slow but cheap; &bThermal &3Aqueous Accumulators&r, which are a bit more expensive but way faster; and &bGregTech &3Infinite Water Covers&r, which are much more expensive, but save space because they're covers, and make water 16x faster than &3Accumulators&r.

Right now, you should probably use the &3Aqueous Accumulator&r.
moni.quest.water.subtitle: &oYes, there's a quest for &9Water&r.
